Then look no further than Rixos Premium Dubai, a luxury hotel that brings the best of Dubai to your doorstep.
Guest rooms offer amenities such as a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a minibar, and guests can go online with free wifi offered by the hotel.
Rixos Premium Dubai features room service and a concierge, to help make your stay more enjoyable. The property also boasts a pool and breakfast. If you are driving to Rixos Premium Dubai, free parking is available.
Close to some of Dubai's most popular landmarks, such as Flying Cup (0.3 mi) and Dubai Water Canal (0.6 mi), Rixos Premium Dubai is a great destination for tourists.
While in Dubai, you may want to check out some of the restaurants that are a short walk away from Rixos Premium Dubai, including Buddha-Bar (0.7 mi), Barasti Beach Bar (1.0 mi), and Observatory Bar & Grill (0.9 mi).
Best of all, Rixos Premium Dubai makes it easy to experience some great Dubai attractions like The Walk At JBR (0.3 mi), which is a short distance away.
We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Rixos Premium Dubai as you experience everything Dubai has to offer.

About Us
Dirty Al’s has been in operation since 1986 and has always provided the freshest seafood to thousands of visitors from all over the world.
As a family owned and operated business, we have always taken great pride in taking care of each customer and providing them with a unique experience that they can only get from eating at Dirty Al’s. Dirty Al promises every customer that they will only be served the absolute freshest seafood caught in the wild off the Gulf of Mexico.
A Father and his Sons Make a Great Team!
Alfonso Salazar, better known as “Dirty Al” originally started shrimping as a young man with his father and 6 brothers. In 2003, he and his youngest son, Cameron, who graduated from Culinary School, transformed his bait stand into a restaurant where together they have been known for having “The World’s Best Fried Shrimp”! In 2005, his other two sons returned home to help grow the business. To this day, they now own 6 restaurants on beautiful South Padre Island and continue to bring only the “best” Gulf Seafood to each customer’s table.

The private and secluded 100-metre beach and infinity pool are reserved for the exclusive use of guests, who not only enjoy signing privileges at the adjacent sister property Shangri-La Barr Al Jissah, but can indulge in daily luxuries like afternoon tea and aperitif hour at no extra cost. Shangri-La Al Husn strives to provide an atmosphere of the utmost tranquillity, and thus maintains a policy of only encouraging guests over the age of 16.

Urdu, Valet Parking, Walk-in Shower, Wardrobe / Closet, Water Park Off-site, Photo Copier / Fax In Business Center A stunning landmark hotel in a distinctive pyramid shape merges Asian style with an Egyptian aesthetic. Ideally located in the city center with a shopping adventure lies around the corner as Raffles Dubai adjoins Wafi mall, one of Dubai's most exclusive shopping and leisure destinations, home to hundreds of boutiques offering an extensive selection of international haute couture, jewelries and gifts in addition to nearby authentic souks, including the impressive Khan Murjan, offering traditional crafts by artisans from the region. Featuring 252 luxurious rooms and suites, this award-winning Dubai hotel offers some of the most spacious rooms in the city, each with generously-sized private balconies. Brilliant contemporary interiors, faultless service and 7 superb restaurants and bars offering an extensive array of dining, entertainment and clubbing options, while Raffles Spa beckons with a pampering menu to emerge transformed, like a lotus that journey from bud to the radiance of full bloom.
Poolside alfresco dining with an authentic menu from the family recipe book of our Italian Chef. Try his homemade pasta particularly the Lasagna or one of the many crispy pizzas.

All 93 rooms and suites of ME Dubai are congruent with Dame Zaha Hadid’s signature Design. Her organic shapes, flowing in appearance, combine with geometric structures to create positive energy and a calming, serene mood. Rooms include a 65inch 4K LED TV, MaxiBar with coffee and tea making facilities, complimentary Wi-Fi, large bathroom with torrential rain shower and bathtub, plus state-of-the-art BOSE sound system. Regard ME Dubai as your ‘Lifestyle Concierge’, delivering bespoke à la carte or pre-selected services within your personal space, tailored to your personality. Whether you’re looking to immerse yourself in the country’s deep-rooted history or explore the emerging art and design scene, Dubai has something to offer for everyone. The pool will be closed until August 1st.

Featuring a striking entrance, high ceilings, landscaped gardens, and a range of well-crafted Italian furnishings, the hotel is truly symbolic of the Versace lifestyle. Every single piece of furniture and fabric that adorns the hotel's 215 hotel rooms and suites, and 169 residences, is designed and tailor-made by Versace. Each of the hotel's 8 restaurants and bars is designed to have an al fresco terrace to reflect the heritage of Palazzos. The hotel is 15 minutes away from the Airport and within 10 minutes of proximity to Downtown / Burj Khalifa, Dubai International Financial Center, Festival City Mall, and Dubai Mall. The beautifully landscaped gardens and the unobstructed views of the Dubai Creek and skyline make the hotel an ideal venue for weddings and social events.

Internet, Wifi, Paid Wifi, Paid Internet, Pool, Free parking, Restaurant, Fitness center, Room service, Wheelchair access, Business center, Shuttle Bus Service, Suites, Bar/Lounge, Spa, Airport transportation, Public Wifi, Dry Cleaning, Meeting rooms, Non-smoking rooms, Laundry Service, Concierge, Banquet Room, Air conditioning, Family Rooms, Multilingual Staff, Accessible rooms, Minibar, Conference Facilities, Safe, Rooftop Bar, Rooftop Pool, Flatscreen TV, Rooftop Terrace, Breakfast Buffet, Poolside Bar, Outdoor pool, Private Beaches, Free Shuttle or Taxi Services, Facilities for Disabled Guests, Kids Stay Free, Arabic, Baggage Storage, Car Hire, Currency Exchange, English, Filipino, Fitness / Spa Locker Rooms, 24-Hour Front Desk, Hindi, Ironing Service, 24-Hour Security, Steam Room, Taxi Service, VIP Room Facilities, Breakfast Available Overlooking the Ras al Khaimah Creek, this 4-star hotel features a rooftop pool with a lounge and a bar with panoramic city and mountain views. It offers elegant rooms and suites and a free private parking. The air-conditioned rooms at the Doubletree Ras Al Khaimah have a seating area with modern furnishings and a 32’flat-screen TV. In-room dining is available upon request. The hotel’s Fitness by Precor has cardio equipment and free weights. Guests can also take a free shuttle to Hampton by Hilton Marjan Island, where extensive facilities include infinity pool, kids club and pool, water sports center, an array of outdoor recreational facilities and a 750-meter private beach. The hotel offers international cuisine at Podium Restaurant. There is also a lobby bar serving coffee and cookies. For light refreshments and shishas, the TreeTop Bar offers a relaxed space during the day and a party atmosphere in the evenings. Dubai International Airport is 50 minutes away by car.

Free parking, Restaurant, Breakfast included, Non-smoking rooms, Non-smoking hotel, Rooftop Terrace, Breakfast Buffet, Arabic, English, Hiking Misfah Old House is in the middle of the old village of Misfat Al Abryeen in Sultanat of where local people are mainly farmers. Our Misfah Old House is about 220 km far from Muscat airport and it is very easy to reach. It is about 40 km south west from Nizwa city (GPS location +23° 8' 24.06", +57° 18' 44.94" ).The houses have 12 rooms with 8 shared bathrooms, We serve Omani traditional food cooked and supplied by local families and we also arrange guided tours within the village and surrounding areas with Omani Local Guides. Also please be kind and inform the guest that:Smoking is not allowed inside the house ( ask for the smoking area )Alcoholic drinks are not allowed at all by Oman Government lawPlease make sure you wear decent clothes in the villageCarry small luggage for the stay in the house only as they have to walk for 5min to get to the houseCheck In time should be before 5 pm as you need to walk for almost 5 min to the house so better doing it in the day light :)

architectural landmark that unites the very best of Arabic and Turkish culture, dining and hospitality. Located in the heart of Abu Dhabi’s retail, entertainment and residential hub, Rixos Marina Abu Dhabi is a multifaceted resort presiding over sparkling waters and a sandy shoreline. Rixos Marina Abu Dhabi reflects the versatility of Abu Dhabi as both a cosmopolitan city abounding with enriching experiences and an archipelago with a rich natural and aquatic heritage. Rixos Marina Abu Dhabi seamlessly fuses sophisticated aquatic and arabesque design to tell the story of Abu Dhabi from its ancient seafaring origins to a thriving cosmopolitan city that takes pride in its heritage and ultimate luxury experiences. As a destination, Rixos Marina Abu Dhabi dares to be different, elevating guest experience through incredible design, amenities, ambience, gastronomy, entertainment, and leisure.

The RIU Classic Hotels offer comfortable rooms and excellent facilities with great leisure and relaxation facilities, as well as international gastronomy. Enjoy a relaxing holiday - whether alone, with family, partner or friends! The location is ideal because of its proximity to Dubai - Burj Khalifa (15 km) and Dubai International Airport (DXB) (11 km) and invites you to explore the area. The hotel has 787 comfortably furnished rooms with free WiFi and offers many amenities. Relax in our spa or get in shape at the gym. 3 outdoor pools, 2 children’s pools (1 of them with slides) and the “Splash Water World” water park. For the youngest guests, RiuLand kids' club (4-7 & 8-12 yrs), and for adults, day and evening entertainment. For lovers of gastronomy, live cooking stations and themed buffets at our main restaurant as well as Asian, Italian and Lebanese specialty restaurants; 6 bars.

architectural landmark that unites the very best of Arabic and Turkish culture, dining and hospitality. Located in the heart of Abu Dhabi’s retail, entertainment and residential hub, Rixos Marina Abu Dhabi is a multifaceted resort presiding over sparkling waters and a sandy shoreline. Rixos Marina Abu Dhabi reflects the versatility of Abu Dhabi as both a cosmopolitan city abounding with enriching experiences and an archipelago with a rich natural and aquatic heritage. Rixos Marina Abu Dhabi seamlessly fuses sophisticated aquatic and arabesque design to tell the story of Abu Dhabi from its ancient seafaring origins to a thriving cosmopolitan city that takes pride in its heritage and ultimate luxury experiences. As a destination, Rixos Marina Abu Dhabi dares to be different, elevating guest experience through incredible design, amenities, ambience, gastronomy, entertainment, and leisure.

Sit chill relax and enjoy your day with us.

Corniche, with spurring 5 star hotels in the heart of the bustling Abu Dhabi metropolis. Experience comfort with afresh luxury hotel rooms including 2-bedroom hotel suites and family hotel rooms. Each room has a marble bathroom and a private balcony with views over the city or the Arabian Gulf, being a hotel with a beach. Sheraton Abu Dhabi Hotel & Resort serves a range of cuisine and a variety of dining venues including Le Bistrot, an international bistro, Tavern, the legendary British pub in Abu Dhabi, all-day dining buffet restaurant Flavours, and a pool bar. Unwind at hotel’s private beach or at the outdoor swimming pools, which are shaded by palm trees. Engage in an active lifestyle while on vacation with our fully equipped fitness center, squash and tennis court or relax at the brand-new spa. Sheraton Abu Dhabi Hotel & Resort is the destination of every occasion.

Pool, Internet, Free Internet, Restaurant, Bar/Lounge, Spa, Wifi, Fitness center, Suites, Free parking, Wheelchair access, Airport transportation, Public Wifi, Dry Cleaning, Meeting rooms, Hot Tub, Non-smoking rooms, Tennis Court, Laundry Service, Concierge, Air conditioning, Multilingual Staff, Accessible rooms, Refrigerator in room, Minibar, Safe, Flatscreen TV, Breakfast Buffet, Poolside Bar, Private Balcony, Adult pool, Outdoor pool, Breakfast Available, Parking, Facilities for Disabled Guests, Housekeeping, Aerobics, Arabic, Baggage Storage, BBQ Facilities, Couples Massage, Currency Exchange, English, Entertainment Staff, Evening Entertainment, Facial Treatments, Fitness Classes, Foot Massage, French, 24-Hour Front Desk, Full Body Massage, German, Hair Dryer, Hammam, Head Massage, Ironing Service, Massage, Pool / Beach Towels, Salon, 24-Hour Security, Shared Lounge / TV Area, Snack Bar, Sun Loungers / Beach Chairs, Sun Terrace, Sun Umbrellas, Table Tennis, Taxi Service, Telephone, Wake Up Service / Alarm Clock Situated in the heart of Marrakesh 5 minutes walking from Jemaa El Fna square, ideal for couples desiring to soak up the charm of Marrakesh, most attractions are within walking distance, including the Palace Bahia, the Koutoubia Mosque, the Gueliz and the Majorelle Gardens. Spectacular views of the Atlas Mountains, the minaret of the Koutoubia and a lush garden of three hectares. This property combines modern comfort and traditional Moroccan accents. Our rooms and suites, carefully designed for the comfort of a luxury accommodation in Marrakesh. They are equipped with an LCD 32 inch TV with a wide selection of international channels, direct dial telephone, air conditioning / heating, mini bar (water and soft drinks), safe and free WiFi connection. The hotel includes 3 restaurants: Buffet Restaurant: a space resolutely modern design, a cuisine with miles and flavor in a warm atmosphere. Snack Restaurant: open only during lunch time. The Culinarium (A La Carte Restaurant): For an exceptional culinary experience, open only for dinner time. Dress code is to be followed : in the common areas no swimsuits in the covered areas (Lobby, restaurant, Lobby Bar and Lounge Bar). Restaurant at dinner: long trousers for the gentlemen, no casual flip-flops, no sportswear. The hotel Spa and pools invite to regenerate in peace, while the fitness center allows you to keep in shape. The property also boasts two tennis clay courts, ping pong table, escape room.

Tennis Court Off-site, Tile / Marble Floor, Video Game Console, Walk-in Shower, Wardrobe / Closet, Yoga Classes Sofitel Bahrain Zallaq Thalassa Sea & Spa offers guests a paradise setting to enjoy an idyllic stay with spectacular views over the Arabian Gulf. The hotel is an exclusive resort catering to both leisure and business travelers and offers the uniqueness of a luxurious location amidst views of the crystal clear turquoise waters of the Arabian Gulf. Sofitel Bahrain celebrates the Kingdom’s legendary hospitality with a French flair and is the first hotel within the GCC countries to offer the unique relaxation of Thalassotherapy. The Thalassa Sea & Spa at Sofitel Bahrain covers 2,000 square meters on two floors; the complex features 14 treatment rooms utilizing marine based products to offer a unique series of Thalassotherapy treatments, massages and wellness programmes. Guests of the Thalassa Sea & Spa can also enjoy a seawater hydrotherapy pool, a freshwater pool, saunas, steam rooms, a hairdresser for men and a beauty salon for women, as well as a Yoga & Pilates studio. Sofitel Bahrain offers 262 rooms and suites, combining comfort and elegance and offering lavish furnishings with breathtaking views of the Arabian Gulf. Within the hotel are 28 suites including 21 Prestige Suites, 6 rooftop Opera suites each offering a private terrace and infinity pool and one Royal Suite complete with a Jacuzzi, private terrace, infinity pool and a uniquely regal design and furnishings. The hotel offers a large swimming pool complete with a swim-up pool bar situated adjacent to its private beach and 5 restaurants. Located on Zallaq Beach 5 minutes from the Bahrain International Circuit, 25 minutes from the heart of Manama and 30 minutes from the Bahrain International Airport, Sofitel Bahrain Zallaq Thalassa Sea & Spa offers the perfect location for a relaxed vacation away from the city or a luxurious vacation with convenient access to the city.

Salalah's best hangout venue. Casual Restaurant/Pub setting with amazing food (including the best steaks in town) and a wide selection of beers, wines, and spirits. Beautiful views of the ocean with both inside seating and an amazing outside terrace seating area.

capital city. This 5-star luxury hotel is centrally located in Abu Dhabi's new business and government district, within easy reach of the Eastern Mangroves, the city's lush natural habitat the Corniche, the city's iconic seaside promenade and the Abu Dhabi National Exhibition Centre. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a family-friendly setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.
As your “home away from home,” the hotel rooms offer air conditioning, a kitchenette, and a minibar, and getting online is easy, with free wifi available.
Guests have access to a 24 hour front desk, room service, and 24 hour check-in while staying at Ertiaad Hotel. In addition, Ertiaad Hotel offers a sauna and an on-site restaurant, which will help make your Tabouk trip additionally gratifying. And, as an added convenience, there is free parking available to guests.
During your visit, be sure to check out one of Tabouk's popular seafood restaurants such as Jandofly and Al Bustan Restaurant, all a short distance from Ertiaad Hotel.
Plus, during your trip, don't forget to check out a history museum, such as Tabuk Castle.
We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Ertiaad Hotel as you experience all of the things Tabouk has to offer.

The Sauce “Café de Paris” was developed by Chef Boubier in 1930 who gifted its secret recipe to his daughter and her husband Mr. Arthur Dumont, owners of “Café de Paris” restaurant in 26 Rue Mont Blanc Geneva; thus enabled them in 1942 to launch an astonishing single menu formula, consisting of a Green Salad, 180 grams of Entrecote Steak with “Café de Paris” sauce and French Fries. The ingredients of this amazing butter sauce are still a secret till today. Four generations later, Mr. François Vouillamoz, the current owner of the original Entrecôte Café de Paris Chez Boubier 1930 restaurant in Geneva is the only person in the world who holds the secret of the “Café de Paris” sauce as it was originated in 1930 and he blends it discretely at his kitchen laboratory underneath his restaurant. You can now taste the original “Café de Paris” sauce specially flown by plane from Geneva exclusively to our franchised restaurants in MENA in Riyadh, Dubai, Abu Dhabi, Al Ain, Sharjah and Al Ula.

Salalah's best hangout venue. Casual Restaurant/Pub setting with amazing food (including the best steaks in town) and a wide selection of beers, wines, and spirits. Beautiful views of the ocean with both inside seating and an amazing outside terrace seating area.

Kui-Zin, this name is a play on words: Kui for "cooked" and Zin which means "good" in Arabic. "Good", even "Better" is our concept. And, to succeed in this challenge, we opted for "homemade": concocted by our chef Kenza, who lived 12 years in Italy and is passionate about culinary creation. she offers a varied menu: Moroccan, Italian, French dishes and revisited recipes. Natural, fresh products and aromatic herbs are featured at Kui-Zin. We take advantage of all the benefits of the products of our beautiful country to make you discover the magic of flavors, scents, and tastes, all in a lively and dynamic atmosphere provided by nice music and a charming terrace.

in Qatar. Boasting a private beach and stunning outdoor facilities including an outdoor pool, children’s pool and fitness center, this 5-star Doha convention hotel is ideally located in the city center of Doha and only 15 minutes away from the Hamad International Airport. Travelers who choose the Sheraton Grand Doha will take in Doha’s stunning views from the private balcony of its luxury rooms or suites and will be able to connect with family and friends in the comfort of the accommodations’ separate living area. The Sheraton Grand Doha is only minutes away from Qatar’s most iconic landmarks allowing guests to easily immerse in art and history at the Museum of Islamic Art, take a stroll down Doha Corniche or find trinkets to take home at Souq Waqif. The 24-hour fitness center offers extensive services from tennis to private training and yoga classes. Located in the vibrant district of Al Taawun, Pullman Sharjah is a playground for creative explorers and business professionals alike. A short hop from Al Khan Bay, Al Qasba waterfront and Expo Centre Sharjah, it makes work and play a breeze. Sharjah International Airport and Dubai International Airport are both a short drive away. Arrive, check-in and let the hotel take care of the rest. With stylish rooms and suites that have it all in the heart of Sharjah, the hotel offers plenty of choice for those that want more from their stay. Settle into your new home away from home, watch the latest blockbusters on TV, stay connected with free Wi-Fi or dance to your own beat with handy wireless music stations in every room. Hungry for more? Our two restaurants and bar in Sharjah city centre will satisfy every appetite. Al Khan presents international specialities and live cooking stations, while The Junction serves up a fresh take on social dining. No sunshine-fueled day would be complete without a dip – the Infinity Pool Bar is a deliciously refreshing spot to enjoy light meals. Getting down to business has never been easier with hyper-connected meeting rooms, business services and event spaces that will inspire you. The hotel also takes the business of leisure seriously so you can work out with the best, or unwind with a signature spa ritual. Practice your stretch at the yoga deck and dive deep into the indoor or outdoor pool. There’s even a dedicated medical center with daycare surgery services so guests can make every moment count, all in one address. Pullman Sharjah is a place to inspire the mind and recharge the body in an enviable central Sharjah location.

Kui-Zin, this name is a play on words: Kui for "cooked" and Zin which means "good" in Arabic. "Good", even "Better" is our concept. And, to succeed in this challenge, we opted for "homemade": concocted by our chef Kenza, who lived 12 years in Italy and is passionate about culinary creation. she offers a varied menu: Moroccan, Italian, French dishes and revisited recipes. Natural, fresh products and aromatic herbs are featured at Kui-Zin. We take advantage of all the benefits of the products of our beautiful country to make you discover the magic of flavors, scents, and tastes, all in a lively and dynamic atmosphere provided by nice music and a charming terrace.

Internet, Free parking, Restaurant, Breakfast included, Non-smoking rooms, Air conditioning, Family Rooms, Breakfast Buffet, Outdoor pool, Arabic, English, Secured Parking, Free Internet, Airport transportation, Baggage Storage, BBQ Facilities, Bicycle Rental, Hiking, Kid-Friendly Buffet, Outdoor Fireplace, Outdoor Furniture, Pool with View, Shallow End, Sun Terrace Jebel Shams Resort is located in the Wilayat of Al Hamra which is part of the Ancient city of NIZWA. The Resort is built atop of the highest peak in Oman. Jebel Shams is known as "The Mountain of The Sun" and rises to an altitude of 3000 metres. The most amazing sunsets can be experienced from here. A 4 x 4 vehicle is the recommended form of transport to reach our location and takes approximately 40 minutes to ascend from the nearest town of AL-Hamra. The area is home to weavers of heavy woolen rugs in distinctive colours and geometric designs. The views of the Grand Canyon from Jebel Shams Resort are amazing, ideally situated just minutes walk away from the Canyon and some fabulous Trekking and Mountain Biking, just some activities available to our guests. The temperature in Summer is ideal, usually around 30 degrees Celcius, which makes it an ideal place for a weekend break from the heat of the city's of Muscat and elsewhere for weekend breaks or a great place to explore for visitors around the Globe. Please come and visit us at our retreat and enjoy a wonderful welcome from our staff and take in the fascinating view of the Grand Canyon and the entire plateau.

This luxury eco-resort tucked away in a scenic dune offers an exclusive vacation experience. One requires a 4-Wheel drive vehicle to cover the stretch of 27 km from Bidiyah of wilderness desert sand paths leading up to the resort. Arabian Nights Resort and Spa offers a spectacular dune view of nature and excellent amenities with unparalleled hospitality, making it one of the best luxury desert resorts in Oman. With comfortable sit out areas, provisions for bonfires and outdoor dining, the resort is the perfect destination for a relaxed vacation to unwind surrounded by nature. It is ideally placed for exploring the surrounding areas, like the Wadi Bani Khalid and Wadi Tiwi. The resort is also the ideal for those wishing to go for adventurous and unique activities like desert trekking, Fat bike riding, visit to Bedouin house, Sand Boards, Dune Bashing and Desert Drive. One can also spend a relaxed day lounging at the resort in the swimming pool located onsite along with the poolside bar. Situated in The Sharqiya Sands the resort offers unique experience of the surrounding dunes and one can also enjoy every bit of authentic nature.

Then look no further than Rixos Premium Dubai, a luxury hotel that brings the best of Dubai to your doorstep.
Guest rooms offer amenities such as a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a minibar, and guests can go online with free wifi offered by the hotel.
Rixos Premium Dubai features room service and a concierge, to help make your stay more enjoyable. The property also boasts a pool and breakfast. If you are driving to Rixos Premium Dubai, free parking is available.
Close to some of Dubai's most popular landmarks, such as Flying Cup (0.3 mi) and Dubai Water Canal (0.6 mi), Rixos Premium Dubai is a great destination for tourists.
While in Dubai, you may want to check out some of the restaurants that are a short walk away from Rixos Premium Dubai, including Buddha-Bar (0.7 mi), Barasti Beach Bar (1.0 mi), and Observatory Bar & Grill (0.9 mi).
Best of all, Rixos Premium Dubai makes it easy to experience some great Dubai attractions like The Walk At JBR (0.3 mi), which is a short distance away.
We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Rixos Premium Dubai as you experience everything Dubai has to offer.

The home of traditional Lebanese dining, Huda Restaurant brings the true spirit of Lebanon to Qatar. Huda serves delectable home-cooked style cuisine in a welcoming contemporary setting. Discover the finest Lebanese food, the warmest atmosphere and the best hospitality in the heart of Doha with a unique Huda experience. Huda Restaurant serves a lavish selection of hot and cold mezze, grill items designed for sharing, and a choice of authentic desserts in a warm, family-friendly atmosphere that suits all of our guests.

Kids Activities, Shuttle Bus Service, Room service, Free parking, Restaurant, Kitchenette, Spa, Airport transportation, Wifi, Free Wifi, Dry Cleaning, Meeting rooms, Hot Tub, Business center, Laundry Service, Air conditioning, Family Rooms, Minibar, Non-smoking hotel, Safe, Parking, Housekeeping, Sauna, Allergy-free Room, Arabic, Baggage Storage, Bath / Shower, Breakfast in the Room, Bridal Suite, 24-Hour Check-in, Express Check-in / Check-out, English, 24-Hour Front Desk, Hammam, Hindi, Iron, Ironing Service, Kids' Meals, Kitchenware, Massage, Newspaper, Private Check-in / Check-out, Seating Area, 24-Hour Security, Shared Lounge / TV Area, Snack Bar, Sofa, Soundproof Rooms, Special Diet Menus, Sun Terrace, Telephone, Turkish, VIP Room Facilities See why so many travelers make Ertiaad Hotel their hotel of choice when visiting Tabouk. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a family-friendly setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.
As your “home away from home,” the hotel rooms offer air conditioning, a kitchenette, and a minibar, and getting online is easy, with free wifi available.
Guests have access to a 24 hour front desk, room service, and 24 hour check-in while staying at Ertiaad Hotel. In addition, Ertiaad Hotel offers a sauna and an on-site restaurant, which will help make your Tabouk trip additionally gratifying. And, as an added convenience, there is free parking available to guests.
During your visit, be sure to check out one of Tabouk's popular seafood restaurants such as Jandofly and Al Bustan Restaurant, all a short distance from Ertiaad Hotel.
Plus, during your trip, don't forget to check out a history museum, such as Tabuk Castle.
We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Ertiaad Hotel as you experience all of the things Tabouk has to offer.

About Us
Dirty Al’s has been in operation since 1986 and has always provided the freshest seafood to thousands of visitors from all over the world.
As a family owned and operated business, we have always taken great pride in taking care of each customer and providing them with a unique experience that they can only get from eating at Dirty Al’s. Dirty Al promises every customer that they will only be served the absolute freshest seafood caught in the wild off the Gulf of Mexico.
A Father and his Sons Make a Great Team!
Alfonso Salazar, better known as “Dirty Al” originally started shrimping as a young man with his father and 6 brothers. In 2003, he and his youngest son, Cameron, who graduated from Culinary School, transformed his bait stand into a restaurant where together they have been known for having “The World’s Best Fried Shrimp”! In 2005, his other two sons returned home to help grow the business. To this day, they now own 6 restaurants on beautiful South Padre Island and continue to bring only the “best” Gulf Seafood to each customer’s table.

With great food and a family atmosphere, Bahay Kubo is well known in the Filipino community as one of the best restaurants on the island. If you have never tried Filipino food it is an experience you do not want to miss. Bahay Kubo offers traditional and modern style Filipino dishes with an extensive menu that will please anyone’s palate. Some of the more popular dishes on the menu and the chef’s specialties include Crispy Pata, Lechon Belly, Lechon Kawali and Boneless Bangus. In true Filipino fashion, Bahay Kubo encourages friendship and bonding among friends and family by serving food in the middle of the table to be shared by everyone instead of being served as single portions on individual plates. In addition to the great food, Bahay Kubo offers a function room that can fit about 20 people at no additional cost. It can be used for birthdays, parties or just a private area to have a night out with your friends singing karaoke.

Internet, Free parking, Restaurant, Breakfast included, Non-smoking rooms, Air conditioning, Family Rooms, Breakfast Buffet, Outdoor pool, Arabic, English, Secured Parking, Free Internet, Airport transportation, Baggage Storage, BBQ Facilities, Bicycle Rental, Hiking, Kid-Friendly Buffet, Outdoor Fireplace, Outdoor Furniture, Pool with View, Shallow End, Sun Terrace Jebel Shams Resort is located in the Wilayat of Al Hamra which is part of the Ancient city of NIZWA. The Resort is built atop of the highest peak in Oman. Jebel Shams is known as "The Mountain of The Sun" and rises to an altitude of 3000 metres. The most amazing sunsets can be experienced from here. A 4 x 4 vehicle is the recommended form of transport to reach our location and takes approximately 40 minutes to ascend from the nearest town of AL-Hamra. The area is home to weavers of heavy woolen rugs in distinctive colours and geometric designs. The views of the Grand Canyon from Jebel Shams Resort are amazing, ideally situated just minutes walk away from the Canyon and some fabulous Trekking and Mountain Biking, just some activities available to our guests. The temperature in Summer is ideal, usually around 30 degrees Celcius, which makes it an ideal place for a weekend break from the heat of the city's of Muscat and elsewhere for weekend breaks or a great place to explore for visitors around the Globe. Please come and visit us at our retreat and enjoy a wonderful welcome from our staff and take in the fascinating view of the Grand Canyon and the entire plateau.

About Us
Dirty Al’s has been in operation since 1986 and has always provided the freshest seafood to thousands of visitors from all over the world.
As a family owned and operated business, we have always taken great pride in taking care of each customer and providing them with a unique experience that they can only get from eating at Dirty Al’s. Dirty Al promises every customer that they will only be served the absolute freshest seafood caught in the wild off the Gulf of Mexico.
A Father and his Sons Make a Great Team!
Alfonso Salazar, better known as “Dirty Al” originally started shrimping as a young man with his father and 6 brothers. In 2003, he and his youngest son, Cameron, who graduated from Culinary School, transformed his bait stand into a restaurant where together they have been known for having “The World’s Best Fried Shrimp”! In 2005, his other two sons returned home to help grow the business. To this day, they now own 6 restaurants on beautiful South Padre Island and continue to bring only the “best” Gulf Seafood to each customer’s table.

Internet, Suites, Room service, Free Internet, Restaurant, Wifi, Dry Cleaning, Meeting rooms, Non-smoking rooms, Business center, Laundry Service, Concierge, Air conditioning, Accessible rooms, Refrigerator in room, Non-smoking hotel, Safe, Breakfast Buffet, Arabic, Bath / Shower, Wheelchair access, Airport transportation, Public Wifi, Free Wifi, Family Rooms, Flatscreen TV, Parking, Baggage Storage, Express Check-in / Check-out, Coffee Shop, Coffee / Tea Maker, Currency Exchange, English, 24-Hour Front Desk, Gift Shop, Ironing Service, Newspaper, Shops, Snack Bar, Special Diet Menus See why so many travelers make Al Haram Hotel their hotel of choice when visiting Medina. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a family-friendly setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.
As your “home away from home,” the hotel rooms offer a flat screen TV, a minibar, and a refrigerator, and getting online is easy, with free wifi available.
Guests have access to a 24 hour front desk, room service, and a concierge while staying at Al Haram Hotel. In addition, Al Haram Hotel offers an on-site restaurant, which will help make your Medina trip additionally gratifying. And, as an added convenience, there is parking available to guests.
While you’re here, be sure to check out Al Rawdha Restaurant, one of the seafood restaurants that can be found in Medina, which is a short distance from Al Haram Hotel.
Looking to explore? Then look no further than Al-Masjid an-Nabawi (0.2 mi), Quba Mosque (0.7 mi), and Jannatul Baqi (0.6 mi), which are some popular Medina attractions – all conveniently located within walking distance of the hotel.
At Al Haram Hotel, your comfort and satisfaction come first, and they look forward to welcoming you to Medina.

The Tower’s signature restaurant offers a palette-pleasing mix of oriental and international cuisine. It operates daily as Open buffet for breakfast, lunch, and dinner with seasonal menus. A reservation is recommended.

On Muttrah Corniche, opposite the fish market, the charm of the French restaurant « La Brasserie » awaits you from 9AM to 10PM. Come and relax in this quality establishment. The rooms on the ground floor and first floor will welcome you for breakfast, lunch or dinner. The second floor, with its large bay windows overlooking the Corniche, hosts both private and public events. Finally, our staff will also be happy to serve you a coffee on the restaurant's sunny terrace. In addition to its usual card, La Brasserie proposes you every day a menu of the day according to the catch of the day available at the fish market. All French dishes prepared by the cooks are homemade with fresh products that will satisfy all lovers of French cuisine. Instagram: labrasserie_oman

For those interested in checking out Fujairah Historic Fort (1.4 mi) while visiting Fujairah, Ibis Fujairah is a short distance away.
Ibis Fujairah offers guests an array of room amenities including a flat screen TV, a kitchenette, and air conditioning, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available.

Ibis Fujairah puts the best of Fujairah at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

Kui-Zin, this name is a play on words: Kui for "cooked" and Zin which means "good" in Arabic. "Good", even "Better" is our concept. And, to succeed in this challenge, we opted for "homemade": concocted by our chef Kenza, who lived 12 years in Italy and is passionate about culinary creation. she offers a varied menu: Moroccan, Italian, French dishes and revisited recipes. Natural, fresh products and aromatic herbs are featured at Kui-Zin. We take advantage of all the benefits of the products of our beautiful country to make you discover the magic of flavors, scents, and tastes, all in a lively and dynamic atmosphere provided by nice music and a charming terrace.

About Us
Dirty Al’s has been in operation since 1986 and has always provided the freshest seafood to thousands of visitors from all over the world.
As a family owned and operated business, we have always taken great pride in taking care of each customer and providing them with a unique experience that they can only get from eating at Dirty Al’s. Dirty Al promises every customer that they will only be served the absolute freshest seafood caught in the wild off the Gulf of Mexico.
A Father and his Sons Make a Great Team!
Alfonso Salazar, better known as “Dirty Al” originally started shrimping as a young man with his father and 6 brothers. In 2003, he and his youngest son, Cameron, who graduated from Culinary School, transformed his bait stand into a restaurant where together they have been known for having “The World’s Best Fried Shrimp”! In 2005, his other two sons returned home to help grow the business. To this day, they now own 6 restaurants on beautiful South Padre Island and continue to bring only the “best” Gulf Seafood to each customer’s table.

Kui-Zin, this name is a play on words: Kui for "cooked" and Zin which means "good" in Arabic. "Good", even "Better" is our concept. And, to succeed in this challenge, we opted for "homemade": concocted by our chef Kenza, who lived 12 years in Italy and is passionate about culinary creation. she offers a varied menu: Moroccan, Italian, French dishes and revisited recipes. Natural, fresh products and aromatic herbs are featured at Kui-Zin. We take advantage of all the benefits of the products of our beautiful country to make you discover the magic of flavors, scents, and tastes, all in a lively and dynamic atmosphere provided by nice music and a charming terrace.

About Us
Dirty Al’s has been in operation since 1986 and has always provided the freshest seafood to thousands of visitors from all over the world.
As a family owned and operated business, we have always taken great pride in taking care of each customer and providing them with a unique experience that they can only get from eating at Dirty Al’s. Dirty Al promises every customer that they will only be served the absolute freshest seafood caught in the wild off the Gulf of Mexico.
A Father and his Sons Make a Great Team!
Alfonso Salazar, better known as “Dirty Al” originally started shrimping as a young man with his father and 6 brothers. In 2003, he and his youngest son, Cameron, who graduated from Culinary School, transformed his bait stand into a restaurant where together they have been known for having “The World’s Best Fried Shrimp”! In 2005, his other two sons returned home to help grow the business. To this day, they now own 6 restaurants on beautiful South Padre Island and continue to bring only the “best” Gulf Seafood to each customer’s table.

Ras Al Khaimah Airport is 25 minutes away, and Dubai Airport is 70 minutes away. Citymax Hotel Ras Al Khaimah is perfectly located for exploring the city and its natural beauty. Our team is happy to suggest ideas for sightseeing in Ras Al Khaimah during your stay. Choose from multiple food & beverage options such as The Huddle Sports Bar & Grill, Claypot restaurant, our all-day dining restaurant CityCafe, 24-hour Lavazza coffee shop and the Aqua Pool Bar. Each of the 204 guest rooms provide contemporary comforts such as free WiFi and much more. Unwind by our glorious rooftop pool and stay fit with our state-of-the-art gym. We’ve also got a complimentary shuttle to the public & private beach and offer all guests towels and beach mats. Whether you’re in town for leisure or work, we've got everything you need for a fun and cost-effective stay.

Pool, Internet, Kids Activities, Beachfront, Shuttle Bus Service, Suites, Room service, Free Internet, Free parking, Wheelchair access, Restaurant, Bar/Lounge, Spa, Airport transportation, Wifi, Public Wifi, Free Wifi, Breakfast included, Dry Cleaning, Meeting rooms, Non-smoking rooms, Tennis Court, Business center, Fitness center, Laundry Service, Concierge, Banquet Room, Air conditioning, Family Rooms, Multilingual Staff, Accessible rooms, Refrigerator in room, Minibar, Conference Facilities, Babysitting, Safe, Heated pool, Flatscreen TV, Breakfast Buffet, Poolside Bar, Private Balcony, Butler Service, Infinity Pool, Outdoor pool, Private Beaches, Private Pools, Breakfast Available, Parking, Facilities for Disabled Guests, Kids Club, Sauna, Additional Bathroom, Arabic, Baggage Storage, Bathrobes, Bicycle Rental, Blackout Curtains, Car Hire, Currency Exchange, English, Facial Treatments, Fitness Classes, Fitness / Spa Locker Rooms, Foot Massage, Complimentary Instant Coffee, Complimentary Toiletries, Full Body Massage, Hair Dryer, Ironing Service, Massage, Pool / Beach Towels, Salon, 24-Hour Security, Sun Umbrellas, Taxi Service, Beach Access A beachfront oasis that is the first luxury villa resort in Salalah, Al Baleed Resort Salalah by Anantara offers an exhilarating escape to Oman’s rich heritage and hospitality. Opulently designed to reflect the iconic Middle Eastern fortresses, the resort embodies striking Arabian-inspired features combined with towering palms and the scenic beach. The resort is within reach of abundance of natural wonders and cultural gems whilst also located close to the airport and all sightseeing highlights. The luxury accommodation offer a mix of 136 keys including 30 standard rooms, 10 junior suites, 8 villas and 88 private pool villas. Each accommodation type will feature an amazing view of the lush garden or lagoon or the pristine beach. Guestrooms are equipped with interactive LED TV and media hub, coffee and tea making facilities, separate bathtub and rain shower, walk-in dressing room, internet access, 24-hour room service and in-room safe. The villas feature living quarters, each generously spaced out to ensure maximum privacy and seclusion. Three restaurant and lounge venues offer unique culinary experiences: Sakalan, the themed buffet restaurant with live cooking stations; Al Mina, the Mediterranean beachside restaurant and bar where guests can enjoy zesty flavours while enjoying the view of the pool and beach; and Mekong, the resort’s signature restaurant serving delectable Asian specialty cuisines. The resort has a team of passionately dedicated and knowledgeable hosts and ‘gurus’ to deliver customer centric service and outstanding attention to detail. Culture aficionados can take part in historical and cultural tours, foodies can participate in Spice spoons cooking classes; and spa lovers can indulge in Razul treatment rooms and the first hamman in Salalah. Extensive facilities include outdoor infinity pool, fitness centre, tennis court, and teens and kids club. Bespoke activities and excursions are available for guests to enjoy.

It is about 40 km south west from Nizwa city (GPS location +23° 8' 24.06", +57° 18' 44.94" ).The houses have 12 rooms with 8 shared bathrooms, We serve Omani traditional food cooked and supplied by local families and we also arrange guided tours within the village and surrounding areas with Omani Local Guides. Ruled by royals since its very inception, the region of Punjab is known for food that is quite literally fit for kings. Punjab Grill recreates these riches from the past while adding to them the twist of today. Punjab Grill has by now become one of the most critically acclaimed fine dining restaurants in Abu Dhabi, India, Singapore, Bangkok and recently opened outpost in Washington D.C. The restaurant offers an impressive spread of progressive and classic fine North Indian/Punjabi fare as well as a selection of unique signature beverages. This cuisine has a long-standing tradition, and is famous for very rich, buttery and uniquely flavoured dishes. Punjab Grill’s talented chefs give its unique dishes a modern interpretation and a contemporary twist, both in flavour and presentation. The uniquely designed interior caters to different types of diners and occasions. The restaurant is fully equipped with exquisitely decorated open and private dining areas, lounge and bar seating.

With great food and a family atmosphere, Bahay Kubo is well known in the Filipino community as one of the best restaurants on the island. If you have never tried Filipino food it is an experience you do not want to miss. Bahay Kubo offers traditional and modern style Filipino dishes with an extensive menu that will please anyone’s palate. Some of the more popular dishes on the menu and the chef’s specialties include Crispy Pata, Lechon Belly, Lechon Kawali and Boneless Bangus. In true Filipino fashion, Bahay Kubo encourages friendship and bonding among friends and family by serving food in the middle of the table to be shared by everyone instead of being served as single portions on individual plates. In addition to the great food, Bahay Kubo offers a function room that can fit about 20 people at no additional cost. It can be used for birthdays, parties or just a private area to have a night out with your friends singing karaoke.

Kui-Zin, this name is a play on words: Kui for "cooked" and Zin which means "good" in Arabic. "Good", even "Better" is our concept. And, to succeed in this challenge, we opted for "homemade": concocted by our chef Kenza, who lived 12 years in Italy and is passionate about culinary creation. she offers a varied menu: Moroccan, Italian, French dishes and revisited recipes. Natural, fresh products and aromatic herbs are featured at Kui-Zin. We take advantage of all the benefits of the products of our beautiful country to make you discover the magic of flavors, scents, and tastes, all in a lively and dynamic atmosphere provided by nice music and a charming terrace.

Rentals, Photo Copier / Fax In Business Center, Yoga Classes Sheraton Grand Doha Resort & Convention Hotel has earned its place through time as an iconic destination for leisure and business travelers in Qatar. Boasting a private beach and stunning outdoor facilities including an outdoor pool, children’s pool and fitness center, this 5-star Doha convention hotel is ideally located in the city center of Doha and only 15 minutes away from the Hamad International Airport. Travelers who choose the Sheraton Grand Doha will take in Doha’s stunning views from the private balcony of its luxury rooms or suites and will be able to connect with family and friends in the comfort of the accommodations’ separate living area. The Sheraton Grand Doha is only minutes away from Qatar’s most iconic landmarks allowing guests to easily immerse in art and history at the Museum of Islamic Art, take a stroll down Doha Corniche or find trinkets to take home at Souq Waqif. The 24-hour fitness center offers extensive services from tennis to private training and yoga classes. The hotel offers diverse dining choices in 7 restaurants, bars and lounges, all featuring international tastes that inspire. Make the most of your time in the city. Sheraton Grand Doha Resort & Convention Hotel, where the world comes together.

Internet, Room service, Free Internet, Restaurant, Kitchenette, Wifi, Free Wifi, Non-smoking rooms, Laundry Service, Concierge, Air conditioning, Family Rooms, Microwave, Refrigerator in room, Non-smoking hotel, Parking, Arabic, Bath / Shower, Coffee Shop, Coffee / Tea Maker, Desk, English, Iron, Seating Area, Sofa, Telephone, Washing Machine Hamasa Plaza Hotel and Apartments is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Buraimi, offering a romantic environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.
Hamasa Plaza Hotel and Apartments offers guests an array of room amenities including a kitchenette, a refrigerator, and air conditioning, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available.
The hotel offers a concierge, room service, and a coffee shop, to make your visit even more pleasant. The property also features an on-site restaurant. Guests arriving by vehicle have access to parking.
If you’re looking for something to do, Al Hillah Castle (0.5 mi) is a nice way to spend some time, and it is within walking distance of Hamasa Plaza Hotel and Apartments.
Enjoy your stay in Buraimi!

Kui-Zin, this name is a play on words: Kui for "cooked" and Zin which means "good" in Arabic. "Good", even "Better" is our concept. And, to succeed in this challenge, we opted for "homemade": concocted by our chef Kenza, who lived 12 years in Italy and is passionate about culinary creation. she offers a varied menu: Moroccan, Italian, French dishes and revisited recipes. Natural, fresh products and aromatic herbs are featured at Kui-Zin. We take advantage of all the benefits of the products of our beautiful country to make you discover the magic of flavors, scents, and tastes, all in a lively and dynamic atmosphere provided by nice music and a charming terrace.

Rentals, Photo Copier / Fax In Business Center, Yoga Classes Sheraton Grand Doha Resort & Convention Hotel has earned its place through time as an iconic destination for leisure and business travelers in Qatar. Boasting a private beach and stunning outdoor facilities including an outdoor pool, children’s pool and fitness center, this 5-star Doha convention hotel is ideally located in the city center of Doha and only 15 minutes away from the Hamad International Airport. Travelers who choose the Sheraton Grand Doha will take in Doha’s stunning views from the private balcony of its luxury rooms or suites and will be able to connect with family and friends in the comfort of the accommodations’ separate living area. The Sheraton Grand Doha is only minutes away from Qatar’s most iconic landmarks allowing guests to easily immerse in art and history at the Museum of Islamic Art, take a stroll down Doha Corniche or find trinkets to take home at Souq Waqif. The 24-hour fitness center offers extensive services from tennis to private training and yoga classes. The hotel offers diverse dining choices in 7 restaurants, bars and lounges, all featuring international tastes that inspire. Make the most of your time in the city. Sheraton Grand Doha Resort & Convention Hotel, where the world comes together.

Then look no further than Rixos Premium Dubai, a luxury hotel that brings the best of Dubai to your doorstep.
Guest rooms offer amenities such as a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a minibar, and guests can go online with free wifi offered by the hotel.
Rixos Premium Dubai features room service and a concierge, to help make your stay more enjoyable. The property also boasts a pool and breakfast. If you are driving to Rixos Premium Dubai, free parking is available.
Close to some of Dubai's most popular landmarks, such as Flying Cup (0.3 mi) and Dubai Water Canal (0.6 mi), Rixos Premium Dubai is a great destination for tourists.
While in Dubai, you may want to check out some of the restaurants that are a short walk away from Rixos Premium Dubai, including Buddha-Bar (0.7 mi), Barasti Beach Bar (1.0 mi), and Observatory Bar & Grill (0.9 mi).
Best of all, Rixos Premium Dubai makes it easy to experience some great Dubai attractions like The Walk At JBR (0.3 mi), which is a short distance away.
We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Rixos Premium Dubai as you experience everything Dubai has to offer.

This luxury eco-resort tucked away in a scenic dune offers an exclusive vacation experience. One requires a 4-Wheel drive vehicle to cover the stretch of 27 km from Bidiyah of wilderness desert sand paths leading up to the resort. Arabian Nights Resort and Spa offers a spectacular dune view of nature and excellent amenities with unparalleled hospitality, making it one of the best luxury desert resorts in Oman. With comfortable sit out areas, provisions for bonfires and outdoor dining, the resort is the perfect destination for a relaxed vacation to unwind surrounded by nature. It is ideally placed for exploring the surrounding areas, like the Wadi Bani Khalid and Wadi Tiwi. The resort is also the ideal for those wishing to go for adventurous and unique activities like desert trekking, Fat bike riding, visit to Bedouin house, Sand Boards, Dune Bashing and Desert Drive. One can also spend a relaxed day lounging at the resort in the swimming pool located onsite along with the poolside bar. Situated in The Sharqiya Sands the resort offers unique experience of the surrounding dunes and one can also enjoy every bit of authentic nature.

About Us
Dirty Al’s has been in operation since 1986 and has always provided the freshest seafood to thousands of visitors from all over the world.
As a family owned and operated business, we have always taken great pride in taking care of each customer and providing them with a unique experience that they can only get from eating at Dirty Al’s. Dirty Al promises every customer that they will only be served the absolute freshest seafood caught in the wild off the Gulf of Mexico.
A Father and his Sons Make a Great Team!
Alfonso Salazar, better known as “Dirty Al” originally started shrimping as a young man with his father and 6 brothers. In 2003, he and his youngest son, Cameron, who graduated from Culinary School, transformed his bait stand into a restaurant where together they have been known for having “The World’s Best Fried Shrimp”! In 2005, his other two sons returned home to help grow the business. To this day, they now own 6 restaurants on beautiful South Padre Island and continue to bring only the “best” Gulf Seafood to each customer’s table.

On Muttrah Corniche, opposite the fish market, the charm of the French restaurant « La Brasserie » awaits you from 9AM to 10PM. Come and relax in this quality establishment. The rooms on the ground floor and first floor will welcome you for breakfast, lunch or dinner. The second floor, with its large bay windows overlooking the Corniche, hosts both private and public events. Finally, our staff will also be happy to serve you a coffee on the restaurant's sunny terrace. In addition to its usual card, La Brasserie proposes you every day a menu of the day according to the catch of the day available at the fish market. All French dishes prepared by the cooks are homemade with fresh products that will satisfy all lovers of French cuisine. Instagram: labrasserie_oman

500-metres of stunning coastline, Shangri-La Barr Al Jissah Resort & Spa is spread across 2 distinct wings that are connected in their Arabian spirit of hospitality: Al Waha, “The Oasis” and Al West Bay Lounge is a super cool beachfront lounge that extends out into the West Corniche beach while boasting panoramic views of Abu Dhabi skyline. West Bay Lounge serves a fusion menu of Mediterranean dishes and is the perfect sundowner place for a touch of beachside luxury. Indulge in the authentic Emirati flavors at Arabian Tea House, a restaurant that celebrates the rich culinary heritage of the UAE. With multiple branches in Dubai and Sharjah, this establishment offers a truly immersive dining experience. Step into the cozy ambiance of the restaurant, where you can relish traditional Emirati dishes like Machboos, Harees, and Luqaimat. The menu is a delightful mix of Arabic and Emirati flavors, prepared using fresh and locally-sourced ingredients. The decor is also an ode to Emirati culture, with Arabic-inspired interiors and cozy seating areas. You can savor your meal indoors or opt for an al fresco dining experience in the serene outdoor seating area. Whether you are a resident or a visitor, Arabian Tea House is a must-visit for a taste of the UAE's unique culinary culture.

This luxury eco-resort tucked away in a scenic dune offers an exclusive vacation experience. One requires a 4-Wheel drive vehicle to cover the stretch of 27 km from Bidiyah of wilderness desert sand paths leading up to the resort. Arabian Nights Resort and Spa offers a spectacular dune view of nature and excellent amenities with unparalleled hospitality, making it one of the best luxury desert resorts in Oman. With comfortable sit out areas, provisions for bonfires and outdoor dining, the resort is the perfect destination for a relaxed vacation to unwind surrounded by nature. It is ideally placed for exploring the surrounding areas, like the Wadi Bani Khalid and Wadi Tiwi. The resort is also the ideal for those wishing to go for adventurous and unique activities like desert trekking, Fat bike riding, visit to Bedouin house, Sand Boards, Dune Bashing and Desert Drive. One can also spend a relaxed day lounging at the resort in the swimming pool located onsite along with the poolside bar. Situated in The Sharqiya Sands the resort offers unique experience of the surrounding dunes and one can also enjoy every bit of authentic nature.

Pool, Room service, Free Internet, Restaurant, Bar/Lounge, Free Wifi, Non-smoking rooms, Fitness center, Air conditioning, Safe, Rooftop Pool, Breakfast Buffet, Internet, Suites, Free parking, Spa, Meeting rooms, Laundry Service, Family Rooms, Smoking rooms available, Outdoor pool, Breakfast Available Finding an ideal hotel in Fujairah does not have to be difficult. Welcome to V Hotel Fujairah, a nice option for travelers like you.
Rooms at V Hotel Fujairah offer a minibar and air conditioning providing exceptional comfort and convenience, and guests can go online with free wifi.
Room service is one of the conveniences offered at this hotel. A pool and breakfast will also help to make your stay even more special. If you are driving to V Hotel Fujairah, free parking is available.
While staying at V Hotel Fujairah, visitors can check out Our Lady Of Perpetual Help Church (1.7 mi), which is a popular Fujairah attraction.
If you’re looking for a Mediterranean restaurant, consider a visit to Al Meshwar Restaurant, Shardana Italian Restaurant, or Sardinia Restaurant, which are all conveniently located a short distance from V Hotel Fujairah.
Plus, during your trip, don’t forget to check out some of the popular parks, such as Kalba Corniche Park and Madhab Sulpheric Spring Park.
V Hotel Fujairah puts the best of Fujairah at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

Kui-Zin, this name is a play on words: Kui for "cooked" and Zin which means "good" in Arabic. "Good", even "Better" is our concept. And, to succeed in this challenge, we opted for "homemade": concocted by our chef Kenza, who lived 12 years in Italy and is passionate about culinary creation. she offers a varied menu: Moroccan, Italian, French dishes and revisited recipes. Natural, fresh products and aromatic herbs are featured at Kui-Zin. We take advantage of all the benefits of the products of our beautiful country to make you discover the magic of flavors, scents, and tastes, all in a lively and dynamic atmosphere provided by nice music and a charming terrace.

Being the first one in the Middle East, Manko Doha is the unique ultra-lounge with chic Parisian flair. Offering a fun, social and energetic atmosphere. All night long DJs, late night dining, spread over 4 different bars with unique cocktail experiences and its own cigar lounge. This elegant beachfront setting offers stunning and panoramic views of the Doha skyline.

Hurricane's Grill is an Australian favourite, famous for the best steaks and ribs. We're a family-friendly steakhouse that services up generous portions, premium quality and superb value for money. A great meal doesn't have to break the bank! With a view of the iconic Dubai Fountain and a warm, friendly team, coming to Hurricane's Grill is like coming home.

The Sauce “Café de Paris” was developed by Chef Boubier in 1930 who gifted its secret recipe to his daughter and her husband Mr. Arthur Dumont, owners of “Café de Paris” restaurant in 26 Rue Mont Blanc Geneva; thus enabled them in 1942 to launch an astonishing single menu formula, consisting of a Green Salad, 180 grams of Entrecote Steak with “Café de Paris” sauce and French Fries. The ingredients of this amazing butter sauce are still a secret till today. Four generations later, Mr. François Vouillamoz, the current owner of the original Entrecôte Café de Paris Chez Boubier 1930 restaurant in Geneva is the only person in the world who holds the secret of the “Café de Paris” sauce as it was originated in 1930 and he blends it discretely at his kitchen laboratory underneath his restaurant. You can now taste the original “Café de Paris” sauce specially flown by plane from Geneva exclusively to our franchised restaurants in MENA in Riyadh, Dubai, Abu Dhabi, Al Ain, Sharjah and Al Ula.

Salalah's best hangout venue. Casual Restaurant/Pub setting with amazing food (including the best steaks in town) and a wide selection of beers, wines, and spirits. Beautiful views of the ocean with both inside seating and an amazing outside terrace seating area.

For travelers visiting Kuwait City, JW Marriott Hotel Kuwait City is an excellent choice for rest and rejuvenation. Well-known for its luxury environment and proximity to great restaurants and attractions, JW Marriott Hotel Kuwait City makes it easy to enjoy the best of Kuwait City.
Guest rooms offer amenities such as a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a minibar, and guests can go online with free wifi offered by the hotel.
Kuwait City Marriott features a concierge and room service, to help make your stay more enjoyable. The property also boasts a pool and a lounge. If you are driving to JW Marriott Hotel Kuwait City, free parking is available.
Close to some of Kuwait City's most popular landmarks, such as National Evangelical Church (0.1 mi) and Countdown Challenge (0.5 mi), JW Marriott Hotel Kuwait City is a great destination for tourists.
While in Kuwait City, you may want to check out some of the restaurants that are a short walk away from JW Marriott Hotel Kuwait City, including Lenotre (0.9 mi), Sultanchef - Turkish Steakhouse (0.5 mi), and Mais Alghanim (1.0 mi).
If you’re looking for something to do, The Scientific Center (0.9 mi), Kuwait Towers (0.8 mi), and Al Shaheed Park (0.6 mi) are a nice way to spend some time, and they are all within walking distance of JW Marriott Hotel Kuwait City.
Whether you’re traveling for business, pleasure or both, JW Marriott Hotel Kuwait City is sure to make your visit to Kuwait City one worth remembering.

Walk-in Shower, Wardrobe / Closet, Waxing Services, Wine / Champagne, Photo Copier / Fax In Business Center Atana Musandam Resort is a novel member of LVX Preferred Hotels & Resorts, Upscale Luxury with Local Flair, known for its sun-drenched swimming pool and boutique vibes are just two of the main draws of the four-star, 105-room Atana Musandam. Located in the sleepy Musandam Peninsula and dubbed the "Norway of Arabia," thanks to its fjord-like inlets and aquamarine waters, this coastal hideaway makes for an exquisite retreat from ordinary life. After an exciting day of exploration, you can return to your warm and welcoming room of subtle Omani styling. *Catch a sunrise from your private balcony or terrace *Watch your kids play in the children’s pool and shaded playground *Ride an Omani Dhow cruising the sea coast in the Strait of Hormuz *Scuba & Snorkelling to unlock the hidden beauty of the underwaters *Ports of Call Tours *Take a Mountain Safari to Jabal Harim *Take a dolphin-watching cruise around the breathtaking fjords *Rejuvenate in the spa with an aromatherapy massage *Feast on fresh Omani lobster at on-site eatery Al Mawra *Head out on a fishing trip and catch your own seafood dinner Whether you want to simply recharge in the sunshine or immerse yourself in the culture and landscape of Oman, one deep breath of fresh Musandam Peninsula air puts you in instant vacation mode. Evenings are just as relaxing with the gentle sounds of an oud player accompanying your dinner.

Spectacular views of the Atlas Mountains, the minaret of the Koutoubia and a lush garden of three hectares. This property combines modern comfort and traditional Moroccan accents. Our rooms and suites, carefully designed for the comfort of a luxury accommodation in Marrakesh. They are equipped with an LCD 32 inch TV with a wide selection of international channels, direct dial telephone, air conditioning / heating, mini bar (water and soft drinks), safe and free WiFi connection. The hotel includes 3 restaurants: Buffet Restaurant: a space resolutely modern design, a cuisine with miles and flavor in a warm atmosphere. Snack Restaurant: open only during lunch time. The Culinarium (A La Carte Restaurant): For an exceptional culinary experience, open only for dinner time. Dress code is to be followed : in the common areas no swimsuits in the covered areas (Lobby, restaurant, Lobby Bar and Lounge Bar). Restaurant at dinner: long trousers for the gentlemen, no casual flip-flops, no sportswear. The hotel Spa and pools invite to regenerate in peace, while the fitness center allows you to keep in shape. The property also boasts two tennis clay courts, ping pong table, escape room.

Ruled by royals since its very inception, the region of Punjab is known for food that is quite literally fit for kings. Punjab Grill recreates these riches from the past while adding to them the twist of today. Punjab Grill has by now become one of the most critically acclaimed fine dining restaurants in Abu Dhabi, India, Singapore, Bangkok and recently opened outpost in Washington D.C. The restaurant offers an impressive spread of progressive and classic fine North Indian/Punjabi fare as well as a selection of unique signature beverages. This cuisine has a long-standing tradition, and is famous for very rich, buttery and uniquely flavoured dishes. Punjab Grill’s talented chefs give its unique dishes a modern interpretation and a contemporary twist, both in flavour and presentation. The uniquely designed interior caters to different types of diners and occasions. The restaurant is fully equipped with exquisitely decorated open and private dining areas, lounge and bar seating.

About Us
Dirty Al’s has been in operation since 1986 and has always provided the freshest seafood to thousands of visitors from all over the world.
As a family owned and operated business, we have always taken great pride in taking care of each customer and providing them with a unique experience that they can only get from eating at Dirty Al’s. Dirty Al promises every customer that they will only be served the absolute freshest seafood caught in the wild off the Gulf of Mexico.
A Father and his Sons Make a Great Team!
Alfonso Salazar, better known as “Dirty Al” originally started shrimping as a young man with his father and 6 brothers. In 2003, he and his youngest son, Cameron, who graduated from Culinary School, transformed his bait stand into a restaurant where together they have been known for having “The World’s Best Fried Shrimp”! In 2005, his other two sons returned home to help grow the business. To this day, they now own 6 restaurants on beautiful South Padre Island and continue to bring only the “best” Gulf Seafood to each customer’s table.

Kui-Zin, this name is a play on words: Kui for "cooked" and Zin which means "good" in Arabic. "Good", even "Better" is our concept. And, to succeed in this challenge, we opted for "homemade": concocted by our chef Kenza, who lived 12 years in Italy and is passionate about culinary creation. she offers a varied menu: Moroccan, Italian, French dishes and revisited recipes. Natural, fresh products and aromatic herbs are featured at Kui-Zin. We take advantage of all the benefits of the products of our beautiful country to make you discover the magic of flavors, scents, and tastes, all in a lively and dynamic atmosphere provided by nice music and a charming terrace.

location: Bardwell, Bury St. Edmunds, Suffolk, East Anglia, England
preferences_y: Free parking, Restaurant, Breakfast included, Non-smoking rooms, Non-smoking hotel, Rooftop Terrace, Breakfast Buffet, Arabic, English, Hiking Misfah Old House is in the middle of the old village of Misfat Al Abryeen in Sultanat of where local people are mainly farmers. Our Misfah Old House is about 220 km far from Muscat airport and it is very easy to reach. It is about 40 km south west from Nizwa city (GPS location +23° 8' 24.06", +57° 18' 44.94" ).The houses have 12 rooms with 8 shared bathrooms, We serve Omani traditional food cooked and supplied by local families and we also arrange guided tours within the village and surrounding areas with Omani Local Guides. Also please be kind and inform the guest that:Smoking is not allowed inside the house ( ask for the smoking area )Alcoholic drinks are not allowed at all by Oman Government lawPlease make sure you wear decent clothes in the villageCarry small luggage for the stay in the house only as they have to walk for 5min to get to the houseCheck In time should be before 5 pm as you need to walk for almost 5 min to the house so better doing it in the day light :)

The Sauce “Café de Paris” was developed by Chef Boubier in 1930 who gifted its secret recipe to his daughter and her husband Mr. Arthur Dumont, owners of “Café de Paris” restaurant in 26 Rue Mont Blanc Geneva; thus enabled them in 1942 to launch an astonishing single menu formula, consisting of a Green Salad, 180 grams of Entrecote Steak with “Café de Paris” sauce and French Fries. The ingredients of this amazing butter sauce are still a secret till today. Four generations later, Mr. François Vouillamoz, the current owner of the original Entrecôte Café de Paris Chez Boubier 1930 restaurant in Geneva is the only person in the world who holds the secret of the “Café de Paris” sauce as it was originated in 1930 and he blends it discretely at his kitchen laboratory underneath his restaurant. You can now taste the original “Café de Paris” sauce specially flown by plane from Geneva exclusively to our franchised restaurants in MENA in Riyadh, Dubai, Abu Dhabi, Al Ain, Sharjah and Al Ula.

location: La Spezia, Province of La Spezia, Liguria
preferences_y: Kui-Zin, this name is a play on words: Kui for "cooked" and Zin which means "good" in Arabic. "Good", even "Better" is our concept. And, to succeed in this challenge, we opted for "homemade": concocted by our chef Kenza, who lived 12 years in Italy and is passionate about culinary creation. she offers a varied menu: Moroccan, Italian, French dishes and revisited recipes. Natural, fresh products and aromatic herbs are featured at Kui-Zin. We take advantage of all the benefits of the products of our beautiful country to make you discover the magic of flavors, scents, and tastes, all in a lively and dynamic atmosphere provided by nice music and a charming terrace.

About Us
Dirty Al’s has been in operation since 1986 and has always provided the freshest seafood to thousands of visitors from all over the world.
As a family owned and operated business, we have always taken great pride in taking care of each customer and providing them with a unique experience that they can only get from eating at Dirty Al’s. Dirty Al promises every customer that they will only be served the absolute freshest seafood caught in the wild off the Gulf of Mexico.
A Father and his Sons Make a Great Team!
Alfonso Salazar, better known as “Dirty Al” originally started shrimping as a young man with his father and 6 brothers. In 2003, he and his youngest son, Cameron, who graduated from Culinary School, transformed his bait stand into a restaurant where together they have been known for having “The World’s Best Fried Shrimp”! In 2005, his other two sons returned home to help grow the business. To this day, they now own 6 restaurants on beautiful South Padre Island and continue to bring only the “best” Gulf Seafood to each customer’s table.

Shower, Wardrobe / Closet, Photo Copier / Fax In Business Center The first luxury, lifestyle hotel in Doha, Qatar, W Doha brings all the energy of New York City to vibrant Doha. Located in the heart of Doha’s West Bay, each hotel room and apartment is filled with iconic design, tech-savvy amenities, and a stylish ambiance. Indulge in ultimate relaxation with our beach access just few steps away. Savor award-winning cuisine at Market by Jean-Georges or Spice Market; both restaurants are host to three-star Michelin Chef Jean-Georges Vongerichten. Indulge in Italian cuisine at La Spiga by Paper Moon. Go on a journey to Latin America through exceptional Peruvian food at COYA. Soak up the atmosphere in the W signature Living Room or linger over coffee at the W Café. Mingle with the crowd at Wahm, the indoor lounge. The choices for guests are endless at our luxury five-star hotel, from a relaxing experience at Doha’s first and only Sisley Paris Spa to a workout in the FIT gym and a swim in the WET pool.

For travelers visiting Kuwait City, JW Marriott Hotel Kuwait City is an excellent choice for rest and rejuvenation. Well-known for its luxury environment and proximity to great restaurants and attractions, JW Marriott Hotel Kuwait City makes it easy to enjoy the best of Kuwait City.
Guest rooms offer amenities such as a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a minibar, and guests can go online with free wifi offered by the hotel.
Kuwait City Marriott features a concierge and room service, to help make your stay more enjoyable. The property also boasts a pool and a lounge. If you are driving to JW Marriott Hotel Kuwait City, free parking is available.
Close to some of Kuwait City's most popular landmarks, such as National Evangelical Church (0.1 mi) and Countdown Challenge (0.5 mi), JW Marriott Hotel Kuwait City is a great destination for tourists.
While in Kuwait City, you may want to check out some of the restaurants that are a short walk away from JW Marriott Hotel Kuwait City, including Lenotre (0.9 mi), Sultanchef - Turkish Steakhouse (0.5 mi), and Mais Alghanim (1.0 mi).
If you’re looking for something to do, The Scientific Center (0.9 mi), Kuwait Towers (0.8 mi), and Al Shaheed Park (0.6 mi) are a nice way to spend some time, and they are all within walking distance of JW Marriott Hotel Kuwait City.
Whether you’re traveling for business, pleasure or both, JW Marriott Hotel Kuwait City is sure to make your visit to Kuwait City one worth remembering.

Kui-Zin, this name is a play on words: Kui for "cooked" and Zin which means "good" in Arabic. "Good", even "Better" is our concept. And, to succeed in this challenge, we opted for "homemade": concocted by our chef Kenza, who lived 12 years in Italy and is passionate about culinary creation. she offers a varied menu: Moroccan, Italian, French dishes and revisited recipes. Natural, fresh products and aromatic herbs are featured at Kui-Zin. We take advantage of all the benefits of the products of our beautiful country to make you discover the magic of flavors, scents, and tastes, all in a lively and dynamic atmosphere provided by nice music and a charming terrace.

Rentals, Photo Copier / Fax In Business Center, Yoga Classes Sheraton Grand Doha Resort & Convention Hotel has earned its place through time as an iconic destination for leisure and business travelers in Qatar. Boasting a private beach and stunning outdoor facilities including an outdoor pool, children’s pool and fitness center, this 5-star Doha convention hotel is ideally located in the city center of Doha and only 15 minutes away from the Hamad International Airport. Travelers who choose the Sheraton Grand Doha will take in Doha’s stunning views from the private balcony of its luxury rooms or suites and will be able to connect with family and friends in the comfort of the accommodations’ separate living area. The Sheraton Grand Doha is only minutes away from Qatar’s most iconic landmarks allowing guests to easily immerse in art and history at the Museum of Islamic Art, take a stroll down Doha Corniche or find trinkets to take home at Souq Waqif. The 24-hour fitness center offers extensive services from tennis to private training and yoga classes. The hotel offers diverse dining choices in 7 restaurants, bars and lounges, all featuring international tastes that inspire. Make the most of your time in the city. Sheraton Grand Doha Resort & Convention Hotel, where the world comes together.

This luxury eco-resort tucked away in a scenic dune offers an exclusive vacation experience. One requires a 4-Wheel drive vehicle to cover the stretch of 27 km from Bidiyah of wilderness desert sand paths leading up to the resort. Arabian Nights Resort and Spa offers a spectacular dune view of nature and excellent amenities with unparalleled hospitality, making it one of the best luxury desert resorts in Oman. With comfortable sit out areas, provisions for bonfires and outdoor dining, the resort is the perfect destination for a relaxed vacation to unwind surrounded by nature. It is ideally placed for exploring the surrounding areas, like the Wadi Bani Khalid and Wadi Tiwi. The resort is also the ideal for those wishing to go for adventurous and unique activities like desert trekking, Fat bike riding, visit to Bedouin house, Sand Boards, Dune Bashing and Desert Drive. One can also spend a relaxed day lounging at the resort in the swimming pool located onsite along with the poolside bar. Situated in The Sharqiya Sands the resort offers unique experience of the surrounding dunes and one can also enjoy every bit of authentic nature.
