About Us
Dirty Al’s has been in operation since 1986 and has always provided the freshest seafood to thousands of visitors from all over the world.
As a family owned and operated business, we have always taken great pride in taking care of each customer and providing them with a unique experience that they can only get from eating at Dirty Al’s. Dirty Al promises every customer that they will only be served the absolute freshest seafood caught in the wild off the Gulf of Mexico.
A Father and his Sons Make a Great Team!
Alfonso Salazar, better known as “Dirty Al” originally started shrimping as a young man with his father and 6 brothers. In 2003, he and his youngest son, Cameron, who graduated from Culinary School, transformed his bait stand into a restaurant where together they have been known for having “The World’s Best Fried Shrimp”! In 2005, his other two sons returned home to help grow the business. To this day, they now own 6 restaurants on beautiful South Padre Island and continue to bring only the “best” Gulf Seafood to each customer’s table.

This luxury eco-resort tucked away in a scenic dune offers an exclusive vacation experience. One requires a 4-Wheel drive vehicle to cover the stretch of 27 km from Bidiyah of wilderness desert sand paths leading up to the resort. Arabian Nights Resort and Spa offers a spectacular dune view of nature and excellent amenities with unparalleled hospitality, making it one of the best luxury desert resorts in Oman. With comfortable sit out areas, provisions for bonfires and outdoor dining, the resort is the perfect destination for a relaxed vacation to unwind surrounded by nature. It is ideally placed for exploring the surrounding areas, like the Wadi Bani Khalid and Wadi Tiwi. The resort is also the ideal for those wishing to go for adventurous and unique activities like desert trekking, Fat bike riding, visit to Bedouin house, Sand Boards, Dune Bashing and Desert Drive. One can also spend a relaxed day lounging at the resort in the swimming pool located onsite along with the poolside bar. Situated in The Sharqiya Sands the resort offers unique experience of the surrounding dunes and one can also enjoy every bit of authentic nature.

Chat with local fisherman, have coffee with the village shopkeeper and find out more about the art of navigating dows. Make Your Own Story. The beauty of the endless sandy beaches, the gently lapping waves, and light breezes blowing off the Indian Ocean - Atana Stay Al Ashkara welcomes stayers roaming Oman’s wonderful coast. Located in Ash Sharqiyah, where the Wahiba Sands meet the Indian Ocean, blessed with a pleasant microclimate of surprisingly milder temperatures, this pristine beach is where you will find your hip and funky place to rest. Al Ashkara is 30 minutes drive from the Ras al-Jinz Turtle Reserve, and a 4-hour cruise from Muscat most of it on a scenic coastal highway. The transformed property re-opened in July 2019 as a stylish 3-star hotel. It exudes a cool casual vibe with contemporary pops of color and style, wall art in the suites and a central hub serving as living room, restaurant, meeting place and retreat while enjoying a cup of java or a meal. It is where you can meet fellow travellers and where chapters in your Omani story.
Following good traditions, Lucia’s proposes a dining experience that lives in the traditional past, but is also enjoyed by today’s modern diner who also seeks a taste a of the past.

The resort features 162 rooms and suites with magnificent views of beautifully landscaped gardens, the surrounding Hajar mountains and the picturesque Gulf of Oman. Dining venues include six restaurants offering Arabic, Asian, Indian and Mediterranean cuisine. Denniston Architects, spearheaded by renowned visionary Jean-Michel Gathy, is the creative mind behind The Chedi Muscat’s inspired designs while The Restaurant is a creation of Yasuhiro Koichi of design studio SPIN in Tokyo.

The Sauce “Café de Paris” was developed by Chef Boubier in 1930 who gifted its secret recipe to his daughter and her husband Mr. Arthur Dumont, owners of “Café de Paris” restaurant in 26 Rue Mont Blanc Geneva; thus enabled them in 1942 to launch an astonishing single menu formula, consisting of a Green Salad, 180 grams of Entrecote Steak with “Café de Paris” sauce and French Fries. The ingredients of this amazing butter sauce are still a secret till today. Four generations later, Mr. François Vouillamoz, the current owner of the original Entrecôte Café de Paris Chez Boubier 1930 restaurant in Geneva is the only person in the world who holds the secret of the “Café de Paris” sauce as it was originated in 1930 and he blends it discretely at his kitchen laboratory underneath his restaurant. You can now taste the original “Café de Paris” sauce specially flown by plane from Geneva exclusively to our franchised restaurants in MENA in Riyadh, Dubai, Abu Dhabi, Al Ain, Sharjah and Al Ula.

Internet, Free parking, Restaurant, Breakfast included, Non-smoking rooms, Air conditioning, Family Rooms, Breakfast Buffet, Outdoor pool, Arabic, English, Secured Parking, Free Internet, Airport transportation, Baggage Storage, BBQ Facilities, Bicycle Rental, Hiking, Kid-Friendly Buffet, Outdoor Fireplace, Outdoor Furniture, Pool with View, Shallow End, Sun Terrace Jebel Shams Resort is located in the Wilayat of Al Hamra which is part of the Ancient city of NIZWA. The Resort is built atop of the highest peak in Oman. Jebel Shams is known as "The Mountain of The Sun" and rises to an altitude of 3000 metres. The most amazing sunsets can be experienced from here. A 4 x 4 vehicle is the recommended form of transport to reach our location and takes approximately 40 minutes to ascend from the nearest town of AL-Hamra. The area is home to weavers of heavy woolen rugs in distinctive colours and geometric designs. The views of the Grand Canyon from Jebel Shams Resort are amazing, ideally situated just minutes walk away from the Canyon and some fabulous Trekking and Mountain Biking, just some activities available to our guests. The temperature in Summer is ideal, usually around 30 degrees Celcius, which makes it an ideal place for a weekend break from the heat of the city's of Muscat and elsewhere for weekend breaks or a great place to explore for visitors around the Globe. Please come and visit us at our retreat and enjoy a wonderful welcome from our staff and take in the fascinating view of the Grand Canyon and the entire plateau.

Kui-Zin, this name is a play on words: Kui for "cooked" and Zin which means "good" in Arabic. "Good", even "Better" is our concept. And, to succeed in this challenge, we opted for "homemade": concocted by our chef Kenza, who lived 12 years in Italy and is passionate about culinary creation. she offers a varied menu: Moroccan, Italian, French dishes and revisited recipes. Natural, fresh products and aromatic herbs are featured at Kui-Zin. We take advantage of all the benefits of the products of our beautiful country to make you discover the magic of flavors, scents, and tastes, all in a lively and dynamic atmosphere provided by nice music and a charming terrace.

Pool, Internet, Kids Activities, Beachfront, Shuttle Bus Service, Suites, Room service, Free Internet, Free parking, Wheelchair access, Restaurant, Bar/Lounge, Spa, Airport transportation, Wifi, Public Wifi, Free Wifi, Breakfast included, Dry Cleaning, Meeting rooms, Non-smoking rooms, Tennis Court, Business center, Fitness center, Laundry Service, Concierge, Banquet Room, Air conditioning, Family Rooms, Multilingual Staff, Accessible rooms, Refrigerator in room, Minibar, Conference Facilities, Babysitting, Safe, Heated pool, Flatscreen TV, Breakfast Buffet, Poolside Bar, Private Balcony, Butler Service, Infinity Pool, Outdoor pool, Private Beaches, Private Pools, Breakfast Available, Parking, Facilities for Disabled Guests, Kids Club, Sauna, Additional Bathroom, Arabic, Baggage Storage, Bathrobes, Bicycle Rental, Blackout Curtains, Car Hire, Currency Exchange, English, Facial Treatments, Fitness Classes, Fitness / Spa Locker Rooms, Foot Massage, Complimentary Instant Coffee, Complimentary Toiletries, Full Body Massage, Hair Dryer, Ironing Service, Massage, Pool / Beach Towels, Salon, 24-Hour Security, Sun Umbrellas, Taxi Service, Beach Access A beachfront oasis that is the first luxury villa resort in Salalah, Al Baleed Resort Salalah by Anantara offers an exhilarating escape to Oman’s rich heritage and hospitality. Opulently designed to reflect the iconic Middle Eastern fortresses, the resort embodies striking Arabian-inspired features combined with towering palms and the scenic beach. The resort is within reach of abundance of natural wonders and cultural gems whilst also located close to the airport and all sightseeing highlights. The luxury accommodation offer a mix of 136 keys including 30 standard rooms, 10 junior suites, 8 villas and 88 private pool villas. Each accommodation type will feature an amazing view of the lush garden or lagoon or the pristine beach. Guestrooms are equipped with interactive LED TV and media hub, coffee and tea making facilities, separate bathtub and rain shower, walk-in dressing room, internet access, 24-hour room service and in-room safe. The villas feature living quarters, each generously spaced out to ensure maximum privacy and seclusion. Three restaurant and lounge venues offer unique culinary experiences: Sakalan, the themed buffet restaurant with live cooking stations; Al Mina, the Mediterranean beachside restaurant and bar where guests can enjoy zesty flavours while enjoying the view of the pool and beach; and Mekong, the resort’s signature restaurant serving delectable Asian specialty cuisines. The resort has a team of passionately dedicated and knowledgeable hosts and ‘gurus’ to deliver customer centric service and outstanding attention to detail. Culture aficionados can take part in historical and cultural tours, foodies can participate in Spice spoons cooking classes; and spa lovers can indulge in Razul treatment rooms and the first hamman in Salalah. Extensive facilities include outdoor infinity pool, fitness centre, tennis court, and teens and kids club. Bespoke activities and excursions are available for guests to enjoy.

Kui-Zin, this name is a play on words: Kui for "cooked" and Zin which means "good" in Arabic. "Good", even "Better" is our concept. And, to succeed in this challenge, we opted for "homemade": concocted by our chef Kenza, who lived 12 years in Italy and is passionate about culinary creation. she offers a varied menu: Moroccan, Italian, French dishes and revisited recipes. Natural, fresh products and aromatic herbs are featured at Kui-Zin. We take advantage of all the benefits of the products of our beautiful country to make you discover the magic of flavors, scents, and tastes, all in a lively and dynamic atmosphere provided by nice music and a charming terrace.

Kui-Zin, this name is a play on words: Kui for "cooked" and Zin which means "good" in Arabic. "Good", even "Better" is our concept. And, to succeed in this challenge, we opted for "homemade": concocted by our chef Kenza, who lived 12 years in Italy and is passionate about culinary creation. she offers a varied menu: Moroccan, Italian, French dishes and revisited recipes. Natural, fresh products and aromatic herbs are featured at Kui-Zin. We take advantage of all the benefits of the products of our beautiful country to make you discover the magic of flavors, scents, and tastes, all in a lively and dynamic atmosphere provided by nice music and a charming terrace.
Middle Eastern Food in our special way.

Qatar's capital, where the weather is idyllic and the sparkling Persian Gulf hugs the city's eastern border. The Radisson Blu Hotel, Doha is renowned for its attentive service and stunning interiors. Modern, stylish skyscrapers surround the hotel's prime location in the city center, close to the West Bay and Hamad International Airport. Top attractions such as the Museum of Islamic Art, Souq Waqif and MIA Park are all just short a drive from the hotel.

Pool, Internet, Kids Activities, Suites, Room service, Free Internet, Free parking, Wheelchair access, Restaurant, Bar/Lounge, Spa, Airport transportation, Wifi, Public Wifi, Free Wifi, Breakfast included, Dry Cleaning, Meeting rooms, Hot Tub, Non-smoking rooms, Tennis Court, Business center, Fitness center, Laundry Service, Concierge, Banquet Room, Air conditioning, Family Rooms, Multilingual Staff, Smoking rooms available, Accessible rooms, Refrigerator in room, Minibar, Conference Facilities, Babysitting, Safe, Heated pool, Flatscreen TV, Rooftop Terrace, Breakfast Buffet, Poolside Bar, Private Balcony, Butler Service, Infinity Pool, Outdoor pool, Parking, Facilities for Disabled Guests, Housekeeping, Kids Club, Arabic, Baggage Storage, Bathrobes, Bicycle Rental, Bicycle Tours, Car Hire, Facial Treatments, Fitness / Spa Locker Rooms, Foot Massage, Full Body Massage, Ironing Service, Massage, Pool / Beach Towels, Pool with View, 24-Hour Security, Special Diet Menus, Steam Room, VIP Room Facilities, Breakfast Available Perched 2,000 metres above sea level on the curving rim of a great canyon, the resort is a secluded haven for the intrepid and discerning. Discover a cultured treasury of authentic indulgences and immersions in the destination’s rich heritage. The arrival experience takes guests on an adventurous drive – two hours from Muscat International Airport or four and half hours from Dubai – past date plantations, dry riverbeds known locally as wadis, and historical forts. The resort echoes this fortified architecture, placing guests in modern ramparts inspired by the commanding indigenous citadels and re-imagined with sophisticated contemporary interiors. A total of 115 luxury rooms and pool villas overlook either the dramatic canyon or tranquil gardens and a spa-like bathroom complete with a rain shower. Luxury villas grant guests an intimate escape each with personal villa host services and a private infinity pool overlooking the cliffs or hidden in an exotic garden. Each villa features state-of-the-art interactive LED IPTVs and spacious walk-in dressing areas, all adding to a sense of sublime luxury. A selection of six dining venues to choose from, Al Qalaa a fine dining Arabian grill concept, Bella Vista a Roman inspired restaurant overlooking the grand canyon, Al Maisan all day dining serving world classics and cooking classes or Al Baha the café deli situated in the open air courtyard. Celebrate on Diana’s Point platform with a unique private dining experience overlooking the canyons. A cliff-edge infinity pool, two Jacuzzis, children’s pool, state-of-the-art Fitness Centre and tennis court are available to enjoy. The Anantara Spa harnesses the essence of Arabia complete with a Hammam and private outdoor relaxation areas and separate male and female indoor swimming pools. The kids’ and teens’ club offers fun-filled activities for all ages. The resort presents travellers with authentic experiences, allowing them to explore the nearby culture, history and landscape. Activities include Via Ferrata, hiking, cultural tours, abseiling, mountain climbing, archery and mountain biking. Those looking to immerse themselves in the captivating traditions of Oman can visit the mountainside ancient villages and nearby heritage sites or take part in Omani cookery lessons, part of Anantara’s signature Spice Spoons series.
Serves authentic Arabic cuisine,Chinese and Indian

We are just 2 1/2 hrs drive from Muscat, 45 minutes from Nizwa and 15 minutes from Al Hamra, it is a perfect getaway with 30 exclusive rooms for a truly relaxed and comfortable stay. It isn't just an 'Eco Luxe' retreat, but an experience where nature holds pride of place. Where service and hospitality is at its finest. It's an ideal port of call for visitors wanting to start adventurous trekking expeditions and excursions towards the peak of Jabal Shams Mountains. The View provides stylish accommodations apart from enjoying a relaxed time by the campfire or taking a dip in the infinity pool. We offer Free Wifi in all the rooms, restaurant, pool and public areas.

Pool, Free parking, Restaurant, Bar/Lounge, Free Wifi, Free Private Parking Nearby, Room service, Spa, Non-smoking rooms, Air conditioning, Family Rooms, Minibar, Safe, Flatscreen TV, Poolside Bar, Private Balcony, Outdoor pool, Housekeeping, Kids Stay Free, Arabic, Baggage Storage, Bath / Shower, Bathrobes, BBQ Facilities, Body Wrap, Bottled Water, Cable / Satellite TV, Coffee / Tea Maker, Couples Massage, Electric Kettle, English, Facial Treatments, First Aid Kit, Foot Bath, Foot Massage, Complimentary Toiletries, French, Full Body Massage, Hand Massage, Head Massage, Hindi, Ironing Service, Manicure, Massage, Massage Chair, Neck Massage, Nepali, Outdoor Fireplace, Pedicure, Picnic Area, Private Bathrooms, Steam Room, Telephone, Wake Up Service / Alarm Clock, Wine / Champagne Arabian Nights Resort and Spa is located away from the hustle and bustle of the city, on the Al Shariqah Sands. This luxury eco-resort tucked away in a scenic dune offers an exclusive vacation experience. One requires a 4-Wheel drive vehicle to cover the stretch of 27 km from Bidiyah of wilderness desert sand paths leading up to the resort. Arabian Nights Resort and Spa offers a spectacular dune view of nature and excellent amenities with unparalleled hospitality, making it one of the best luxury desert resorts in Oman. With comfortable sit out areas, provisions for bonfires and outdoor dining, the resort is the perfect destination for a relaxed vacation to unwind surrounded by nature. It is ideally placed for exploring the surrounding areas, like the Wadi Bani Khalid and Wadi Tiwi. The resort is also the ideal for those wishing to go for adventurous and unique activities like desert trekking, Fat bike riding, visit to Bedouin house, Sand Boards, Dune Bashing and Desert Drive. One can also spend a relaxed day lounging at the resort in the swimming pool located onsite along with the poolside bar. Situated in The Sharqiya Sands the resort offers unique experience of the surrounding dunes and one can also enjoy every bit of authentic nature.

Free parking, Restaurant, Breakfast included, Non-smoking rooms, Non-smoking hotel, Rooftop Terrace, Breakfast Buffet, Arabic, English, Hiking Misfah Old House is in the middle of the old village of Misfat Al Abryeen in Sultanat of where local people are mainly farmers. Our Misfah Old House is about 220 km far from Muscat airport and it is very easy to reach. It is about 40 km south west from Nizwa city (GPS location +23° 8' 24.06", +57° 18' 44.94" ).The houses have 12 rooms with 8 shared bathrooms, We serve Omani traditional food cooked and supplied by local families and we also arrange guided tours within the village and surrounding areas with Omani Local Guides. Also please be kind and inform the guest that:Smoking is not allowed inside the house ( ask for the smoking area )Alcoholic drinks are not allowed at all by Oman Government lawPlease make sure you wear decent clothes in the villageCarry small luggage for the stay in the house only as they have to walk for 5min to get to the houseCheck In time should be before 5 pm as you need to walk for almost 5 min to the house so better doing it in the day light :)

Pool, Free parking, Restaurant, Bar/Lounge, Free Wifi, Free Private Parking Nearby, Room service, Spa, Non-smoking rooms, Air conditioning, Family Rooms, Minibar, Safe, Flatscreen TV, Poolside Bar, Private Balcony, Outdoor pool, Housekeeping, Kids Stay Free, Arabic, Baggage Storage, Bath / Shower, Bathrobes, BBQ Facilities, Body Wrap, Bottled Water, Cable / Satellite TV, Coffee / Tea Maker, Couples Massage, Electric Kettle, English, Facial Treatments, First Aid Kit, Foot Bath, Foot Massage, Complimentary Toiletries, French, Full Body Massage, Hand Massage, Head Massage, Hindi, Ironing Service, Manicure, Massage, Massage Chair, Neck Massage, Nepali, Outdoor Fireplace, Pedicure, Picnic Area, Private Bathrooms, Steam Room, Telephone, Wake Up Service / Alarm Clock, Wine / Champagne Arabian Nights Resort and Spa is located away from the hustle and bustle of the city, on the Al Shariqah Sands. This luxury eco-resort tucked away in a scenic dune offers an exclusive vacation experience. One requires a 4-Wheel drive vehicle to cover the stretch of 27 km from Bidiyah of wilderness desert sand paths leading up to the resort. Arabian Nights Resort and Spa offers a spectacular dune view of nature and excellent amenities with unparalleled hospitality, making it one of the best luxury desert resorts in Oman. With comfortable sit out areas, provisions for bonfires and outdoor dining, the resort is the perfect destination for a relaxed vacation to unwind surrounded by nature. It is ideally placed for exploring the surrounding areas, like the Wadi Bani Khalid and Wadi Tiwi. The resort is also the ideal for those wishing to go for adventurous and unique activities like desert trekking, Fat bike riding, visit to Bedouin house, Sand Boards, Dune Bashing and Desert Drive. One can also spend a relaxed day lounging at the resort in the swimming pool located onsite along with the poolside bar. Situated in The Sharqiya Sands the resort offers unique experience of the surrounding dunes and one can also enjoy every bit of authentic nature.

About Us
Dirty Al’s has been in operation since 1986 and has always provided the freshest seafood to thousands of visitors from all over the world.
As a family owned and operated business, we have always taken great pride in taking care of each customer and providing them with a unique experience that they can only get from eating at Dirty Al’s. Dirty Al promises every customer that they will only be served the absolute freshest seafood caught in the wild off the Gulf of Mexico.
A Father and his Sons Make a Great Team!
Alfonso Salazar, better known as “Dirty Al” originally started shrimping as a young man with his father and 6 brothers. In 2003, he and his youngest son, Cameron, who graduated from Culinary School, transformed his bait stand into a restaurant where together they have been known for having “The World’s Best Fried Shrimp”! In 2005, his other two sons returned home to help grow the business. To this day, they now own 6 restaurants on beautiful South Padre Island and continue to bring only the “best” Gulf Seafood to each customer’s table.

This luxury eco-resort tucked away in a scenic dune offers an exclusive vacation experience. One requires a 4-Wheel drive vehicle to cover the stretch of 27 km from Bidiyah of wilderness desert sand paths leading up to the resort. Arabian Nights Resort and Spa offers a spectacular dune view of nature and excellent amenities with unparalleled hospitality, making it one of the best luxury desert resorts in Oman. With comfortable sit out areas, provisions for bonfires and outdoor dining, the resort is the perfect destination for a relaxed vacation to unwind surrounded by nature. It is ideally placed for exploring the surrounding areas, like the Wadi Bani Khalid and Wadi Tiwi. The resort is also the ideal for those wishing to go for adventurous and unique activities like desert trekking, Fat bike riding, visit to Bedouin house, Sand Boards, Dune Bashing and Desert Drive. One can also spend a relaxed day lounging at the resort in the swimming pool located onsite along with the poolside bar. Situated in The Sharqiya Sands the resort offers unique experience of the surrounding dunes and one can also enjoy every bit of authentic nature.

The idyllic day to night destination, finds home to beautiful Saadiyat Island of Buddha – Bar Beach. Walking distance to two major shopping malls, the hotel is also a stone's throw away from the souks and historical sites of the Emirates’ old city, as well as Jebel Jais mountains, which host the world’s longest zipline! Ras Al Khaimah Airport is 25 minutes away, and Dubai Airport is 70 minutes away. Citymax Hotel Ras Al Khaimah is perfectly located for exploring the city and its natural beauty. Our team is happy to suggest ideas for sightseeing in Ras Al Khaimah during your stay. Choose from multiple food & beverage options such as The Huddle Sports Bar & Grill, Claypot restaurant, our all-day dining restaurant CityCafe, 24-hour Lavazza coffee shop and the Aqua Pool Bar. Each of the 204 guest rooms provide contemporary comforts such as free WiFi and much more. Unwind by our glorious rooftop pool and stay fit with our state-of-the-art gym. We’ve also got a complimentary shuttle to the public & private beach and offer all guests towels and beach mats. Whether you’re in town for leisure or work, we've got everything you need for a fun and cost-effective stay.

Kui-Zin, this name is a play on words: Kui for "cooked" and Zin which means "good" in Arabic. "Good", even "Better" is our concept. And, to succeed in this challenge, we opted for "homemade": concocted by our chef Kenza, who lived 12 years in Italy and is passionate about culinary creation. she offers a varied menu: Moroccan, Italian, French dishes and revisited recipes. Natural, fresh products and aromatic herbs are featured at Kui-Zin. We take advantage of all the benefits of the products of our beautiful country to make you discover the magic of flavors, scents, and tastes, all in a lively and dynamic atmosphere provided by nice music and a charming terrace.
Following good traditions, Lucia’s proposes a dining experience that lives in the traditional past, but is also enjoyed by today’s modern diner who also seeks a taste a of the past.

Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a family-friendly setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.
As your “home away from home,” the hotel rooms offer a flat screen TV, a minibar, and a refrigerator, and getting online is easy, with free wifi available.
Guests have access to a 24 hour front desk, room service, and a concierge while staying at Al Haram Hotel. In addition, Al Haram Hotel offers an on-site restaurant, which will help make your Medina trip additionally gratifying. And, as an added convenience, there is parking available to guests.
While you’re here, be sure to check out Al Rawdha Restaurant, one of the seafood restaurants that can be found in Medina, which is a short distance from Al Haram Hotel.
Looking to explore? Then look no further than Al-Masjid an-Nabawi (0.2 mi), Quba Mosque (0.7 mi), and Jannatul Baqi (0.6 mi), which are some popular Medina attractions – all conveniently located within walking distance of the hotel.
At Al Haram Hotel, your comfort and satisfaction come first, and they look forward to welcoming you to Medina.

The Sauce “Café de Paris” was developed by Chef Boubier in 1930 who gifted its secret recipe to his daughter and her husband Mr. Arthur Dumont, owners of “Café de Paris” restaurant in 26 Rue Mont Blanc Geneva; thus enabled them in 1942 to launch an astonishing single menu formula, consisting of a Green Salad, 180 grams of Entrecote Steak with “Café de Paris” sauce and French Fries. The ingredients of this amazing butter sauce are still a secret till today. Four generations later, Mr. François Vouillamoz, the current owner of the original Entrecôte Café de Paris Chez Boubier 1930 restaurant in Geneva is the only person in the world who holds the secret of the “Café de Paris” sauce as it was originated in 1930 and he blends it discretely at his kitchen laboratory underneath his restaurant. You can now taste the original “Café de Paris” sauce specially flown by plane from Geneva exclusively to our franchised restaurants in MENA in Riyadh, Dubai, Abu Dhabi, Al Ain, Sharjah and Al Ula.

Situated midway between Salalah and Muscat on the beautiful coast of Oman, it is less than 10 km from the fast-developing commercial and industrial hub of Duqm. Business travelers can host meetings in four state-of-the-art conference rooms, a prestigious executive boardroom and two magnificent ballrooms with the support of a Crowne Meetings Director. To relax, join colleagues for tennis in the superb Fitness Center, or for a night of karaoke at The Frontier Restaurant and Sports Pub. Wi-Fi and parking are complimentary for hotel guests. Couples and families enjoy blissful holidays in Duqm, playing beach volleyball, swimming in the infinity pool and taking romantic walks along the sand. Secluded yet sociable, the hotel is an ideal base for exploring the ancient caves and wadis of the surrounding wilayat.

Kui-Zin, this name is a play on words: Kui for "cooked" and Zin which means "good" in Arabic. "Good", even "Better" is our concept. And, to succeed in this challenge, we opted for "homemade": concocted by our chef Kenza, who lived 12 years in Italy and is passionate about culinary creation. she offers a varied menu: Moroccan, Italian, French dishes and revisited recipes. Natural, fresh products and aromatic herbs are featured at Kui-Zin. We take advantage of all the benefits of the products of our beautiful country to make you discover the magic of flavors, scents, and tastes, all in a lively and dynamic atmosphere provided by nice music and a charming terrace.

Transporting you to the urban underground of the Big Apple, this trendy, immersive industrial space is the ultimate social hangout. Combining mouthwatering food and bev with live entertainment and the latest (and your favourite originals) in gaming, The Central is a social hub, bringing people together to eat, play and enjoy from day to night. Our epic culinary creators have derived some of the juiciest burgers, mouthwatering milkshakes and creative cocktail creations in the region. Driven by quality and designed to surprise, this all-new dining sector is made for all ages. An urban-industrial restaurant, bar and arcade, The Central is a total all-rounder, with dedicated casual dining area, bar, entertaining stage and games arcade. Vibing an interactive atmosphere the whole family can enjoy, the torn-away walls and painted brickwork are covered in handcrafted graffiti, with textured ceilings and knocked-out wall partition frames. Home to some of the leading DJs and musicians in the Emirates, whether you’re bringing the family for a weekend activity, sending the teens out for some space, enjoying a bite to eat with friends or looking for a place to let loose after dark, The Central is just that - your go-to meeting place.

Renowned across the globe for its gastronomic delights, famous guests and deep-rooted ties with the fabulous world of French cinema, Fouquet’s embodies the true art of French cuisine. The original Fouquet’s was founded in Paris in 1899, and to this day it remains one of the city’s most iconic destinations. Located on the corner of the Champs-Elysees and George V avenues, the treasured restaurant is listed as a French monument. Host to the annual César Awards ceremony, the photos of famous guests that adorn the walls provide a proud tribute to the destination’s historical connection with art and film. Furthering its bond with the arts, Fouquet’s found a perfect home at Louvre Abu Dhabi in 2019. A true meeting of minds, Fouquet’s and Louvre Abu Dhabi represent the pinnacle of both cultural and culinary excellence. Fouquet’s Abu Dhabi is the tenth branch to the much-adored brand, with further locations found in Cannes, Toulouse, Marrakech, La Baule, Enghien-les-Bains, Courchevel,

preferences_y: Established in 1972, Curry Mecca was born to share our love for the Bangladeshi & Indian cuisine to the Gravesend community, whilst keeping the family value at the core of our principles. The South Asian flavour comes from many generations before us, and Curry Mecca draws on that taste to serve the Western palate and provide you with an experience which takes you back to the roots of our heritage. Our history is at the core of our ideals. We believe in the finest spices, the richest herbs, and the tongue-tingling flavours for the most authentic exotic taste. Both traditional styles of cooking and modern flair are celebrated within our menu allowing us to offer classic dishes to satisfy and innovative meals to thrill. Our chefs have drawn from their clever passion for food to create several contemporary and mouth-watering dishes. We believe in sharing our historic values, we believe in our authentic flavours – so take a step into our world and visit us at our Gravesend restaurant.

For travelers visiting Kuwait City, JW Marriott Hotel Kuwait City is an excellent choice for rest and rejuvenation. Well-known for its luxury environment and proximity to great restaurants and attractions, JW Marriott Hotel Kuwait City makes it easy to enjoy the best of Kuwait City.
Guest rooms offer amenities such as a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a minibar, and guests can go online with free wifi offered by the hotel.
Kuwait City Marriott features a concierge and room service, to help make your stay more enjoyable. The property also boasts a pool and a lounge. If you are driving to JW Marriott Hotel Kuwait City, free parking is available.
Close to some of Kuwait City's most popular landmarks, such as National Evangelical Church (0.1 mi) and Countdown Challenge (0.5 mi), JW Marriott Hotel Kuwait City is a great destination for tourists.
While in Kuwait City, you may want to check out some of the restaurants that are a short walk away from JW Marriott Hotel Kuwait City, including Lenotre (0.9 mi), Sultanchef - Turkish Steakhouse (0.5 mi), and Mais Alghanim (1.0 mi).
If you’re looking for something to do, The Scientific Center (0.9 mi), Kuwait Towers (0.8 mi), and Al Shaheed Park (0.6 mi) are a nice way to spend some time, and they are all within walking distance of JW Marriott Hotel Kuwait City.
Whether you’re traveling for business, pleasure or both, JW Marriott Hotel Kuwait City is sure to make your visit to Kuwait City one worth remembering.

Indulge in the authentic Emirati flavors at Arabian Tea House, a restaurant that celebrates the rich culinary heritage of the UAE. With multiple branches in Dubai and Sharjah, this establishment offers a truly immersive dining experience. Step into the cozy ambiance of the restaurant, where you can relish traditional Emirati dishes like Machboos, Harees, and Luqaimat. The menu is a delightful mix of Arabic and Emirati flavors, prepared using fresh and locally-sourced ingredients. The decor is also an ode to Emirati culture, with Arabic-inspired interiors and cozy seating areas. You can savor your meal indoors or opt for an al fresco dining experience in the serene outdoor seating area. Whether you are a resident or a visitor, Arabian Tea House is a must-visit for a taste of the UAE's unique culinary culture.

Whether you are a resident or a visitor, Arabian Tea House is a must-visit for a taste of the UAE's unique culinary culture.

Then look no further than Rixos Premium Dubai, a luxury hotel that brings the best of Dubai to your doorstep.
Guest rooms offer amenities such as a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a minibar, and guests can go online with free wifi offered by the hotel.
Rixos Premium Dubai features room service and a concierge, to help make your stay more enjoyable. The property also boasts a pool and breakfast. If you are driving to Rixos Premium Dubai, free parking is available.
Close to some of Dubai's most popular landmarks, such as Flying Cup (0.3 mi) and Dubai Water Canal (0.6 mi), Rixos Premium Dubai is a great destination for tourists.
While in Dubai, you may want to check out some of the restaurants that are a short walk away from Rixos Premium Dubai, including Buddha-Bar (0.7 mi), Barasti Beach Bar (1.0 mi), and Observatory Bar & Grill (0.9 mi).
Best of all, Rixos Premium Dubai makes it easy to experience some great Dubai attractions like The Walk At JBR (0.3 mi), which is a short distance away.
We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Rixos Premium Dubai as you experience everything Dubai has to offer.

Kui-Zin, this name is a play on words: Kui for "cooked" and Zin which means "good" in Arabic. "Good", even "Better" is our concept. And, to succeed in this challenge, we opted for "homemade": concocted by our chef Kenza, who lived 12 years in Italy and is passionate about culinary creation. she offers a varied menu: Moroccan, Italian, French dishes and revisited recipes. Natural, fresh products and aromatic herbs are featured at Kui-Zin. We take advantage of all the benefits of the products of our beautiful country to make you discover the magic of flavors, scents, and tastes, all in a lively and dynamic atmosphere provided by nice music and a charming terrace.

With great food and a family atmosphere, Bahay Kubo is well known in the Filipino community as one of the best restaurants on the island. If you have never tried Filipino food it is an experience you do not want to miss. Bahay Kubo offers traditional and modern style Filipino dishes with an extensive menu that will please anyone’s palate. Some of the more popular dishes on the menu and the chef’s specialties include Crispy Pata, Lechon Belly, Lechon Kawali and Boneless Bangus. In true Filipino fashion, Bahay Kubo encourages friendship and bonding among friends and family by serving food in the middle of the table to be shared by everyone instead of being served as single portions on individual plates. In addition to the great food, Bahay Kubo offers a function room that can fit about 20 people at no additional cost. It can be used for birthdays, parties or just a private area to have a night out with your friends singing karaoke.

Rentals, Photo Copier / Fax In Business Center, Yoga Classes Sheraton Grand Doha Resort & Convention Hotel has earned its place through time as an iconic destination for leisure and business travelers in Qatar. Boasting a private beach and stunning outdoor facilities including an outdoor pool, children’s pool and fitness center, this 5-star Doha convention hotel is ideally located in the city center of Doha and only 15 minutes away from the Hamad International Airport. Travelers who choose the Sheraton Grand Doha will take in Doha’s stunning views from the private balcony of its luxury rooms or suites and will be able to connect with family and friends in the comfort of the accommodations’ separate living area. The Sheraton Grand Doha is only minutes away from Qatar’s most iconic landmarks allowing guests to easily immerse in art and history at the Museum of Islamic Art, take a stroll down Doha Corniche or find trinkets to take home at Souq Waqif. The 24-hour fitness center offers extensive services from tennis to private training and yoga classes. The hotel offers diverse dining choices in 7 restaurants, bars and lounges, all featuring international tastes that inspire. Make the most of your time in the city. Sheraton Grand Doha Resort & Convention Hotel, where the world comes together.

Free parking, Restaurant, Breakfast included, Non-smoking rooms, Non-smoking hotel, Rooftop Terrace, Breakfast Buffet, Arabic, English, Hiking Misfah Old House is in the middle of the old village of Misfat Al Abryeen in Sultanat of where local people are mainly farmers. Our Misfah Old House is about 220 km far from Muscat airport and it is very easy to reach. It is about 40 km south west from Nizwa city (GPS location +23° 8' 24.06", +57° 18' 44.94" ).The houses have 12 rooms with 8 shared bathrooms, We serve Omani traditional food cooked and supplied by local families and we also arrange guided tours within the village and surrounding areas with Omani Local Guides. Also please be kind and inform the guest that:Smoking is not allowed inside the house ( ask for the smoking area )Alcoholic drinks are not allowed at all by Oman Government lawPlease make sure you wear decent clothes in the villageCarry small luggage for the stay in the house only as they have to walk for 5min to get to the houseCheck In time should be before 5 pm as you need to walk for almost 5 min to the house so better doing it in the day light :)

Bahay Kubo offers traditional and modern style Filipino dishes with an extensive menu that will please anyone’s palate. Some of the more popular dishes on the menu and the chef’s specialties include Crispy Pata, Lechon Belly, Lechon Kawali and Boneless Bangus. In true Filipino fashion, Bahay Kubo encourages friendship and bonding among friends and family by serving food in the middle of the table to be shared by everyone instead of being served as single portions on individual plates. In addition to the great food, Bahay Kubo offers a function room that can fit about 20 people at no additional cost. It can be used for birthdays, parties or just a private area to have a night out with your friends singing karaoke.

One of Seattle's oldest diners with a legendary dive bar. Stiff drinks and huge portions of homemade diner classics. Open for breakfast, lunch, dinner and late night. Seattle's best happy hour. We're known for our great Philly Cheesesteaks, hamburgers, chicken fried steak, sandwiches, fish & chips and Pot Roast. And we're famous for our small, dimly lit dive bar. We've been serving Queen Anne since 1930. In the shadow of the Space Needle and steps away from Seattle Center and the new Climate Pledge Arena. A great place to eat and drink before and after Kraken games!

On Muttrah Corniche, opposite the fish market, the charm of the French restaurant « La Brasserie » awaits you from 9AM to 10PM. Come and relax in this quality establishment. The rooms on the ground floor and first floor will welcome you for breakfast, lunch or dinner. The second floor, with its large bay windows overlooking the Corniche, hosts both private and public events. Finally, our staff will also be happy to serve you a coffee on the restaurant's sunny terrace. In addition to its usual card, La Brasserie proposes you every day a menu of the day according to the catch of the day available at the fish market. All French dishes prepared by the cooks are homemade with fresh products that will satisfy all lovers of French cuisine. Instagram: labrasserie_oman

Inspired by the excitement, buzz and bustle of Downtown New York, The Central pioneers a new-gen of family dining and entertainment. Transporting you to the urban underground of the Big Apple, this trendy, immersive industrial space is the ultimate social hangout. Combining mouthwatering food and bev with live entertainment and the latest (and your favourite originals) in gaming, The Central is a social hub, bringing people together to eat, play and enjoy from day to night. Our epic culinary creators have derived some of the juiciest burgers, mouthwatering milkshakes and creative cocktail creations in the region. Driven by quality and designed to surprise, this all-new dining sector is made for all ages. An urban-industrial restaurant, bar and arcade, The Central is a total all-rounder, with dedicated casual dining area, bar, entertaining stage and games arcade. Vibing an interactive atmosphere the whole family can enjoy, the torn-away walls and painted brickwork are covered in handcrafted graffiti, with textured ceilings and knocked-out wall partition frames. Home to some of the leading DJs and musicians in the Emirates, whether you’re bringing the family for a weekend activity, sending the teens out for some space, enjoying a bite to eat with friends or looking for a place to let loose after dark, The Central is just that - your go-to meeting place.

About Us
Dirty Al’s has been in operation since 1986 and has always provided the freshest seafood to thousands of visitors from all over the world.
As a family owned and operated business, we have always taken great pride in taking care of each customer and providing them with a unique experience that they can only get from eating at Dirty Al’s. Dirty Al promises every customer that they will only be served the absolute freshest seafood caught in the wild off the Gulf of Mexico.
A Father and his Sons Make a Great Team!
Alfonso Salazar, better known as “Dirty Al” originally started shrimping as a young man with his father and 6 brothers. In 2003, he and his youngest son, Cameron, who graduated from Culinary School, transformed his bait stand into a restaurant where together they have been known for having “The World’s Best Fried Shrimp”! In 2005, his other two sons returned home to help grow the business. To this day, they now own 6 restaurants on beautiful South Padre Island and continue to bring only the “best” Gulf Seafood to each customer’s table.

And, to succeed in this challenge, we opted for "homemade": concocted by our chef Kenza, who lived 12 years in Italy and is passionate about culinary creation. she offers a varied menu: Moroccan, Italian, French dishes and revisited recipes. Natural, fresh products and aromatic herbs are featured at Kui-Zin. We take advantage of all the benefits of the products of our beautiful country to make you discover the magic of flavors, scents, and tastes, all in a lively and dynamic atmosphere provided by nice music and a charming terrace.

Indulge in the authentic Emirati flavors at Arabian Tea House, a restaurant that celebrates the rich culinary heritage of the UAE. With multiple branches in Dubai and Sharjah, this establishment offers a truly immersive dining experience. Step into the cozy ambiance of the restaurant, where you can relish traditional Emirati dishes like Machboos, Harees, and Luqaimat. The menu is a delightful mix of Arabic and Emirati flavors, prepared using fresh and locally-sourced ingredients. The decor is also an ode to Emirati culture, with Arabic-inspired interiors and cozy seating areas. You can savor your meal indoors or opt for an al fresco dining experience in the serene outdoor seating area. Whether you are a resident or a visitor, Arabian Tea House is a must-visit for a taste of the UAE's unique culinary culture.

With great food and a family atmosphere, Bahay Kubo is well known in the Filipino community as one of the best restaurants on the island. If you have never tried Filipino food it is an experience you do not want to miss. Bahay Kubo offers traditional and modern style Filipino dishes with an extensive menu that will please anyone’s palate. Some of the more popular dishes on the menu and the chef’s specialties include Crispy Pata, Lechon Belly, Lechon Kawali and Boneless Bangus. In true Filipino fashion, Bahay Kubo encourages friendship and bonding among friends and family by serving food in the middle of the table to be shared by everyone instead of being served as single portions on individual plates. In addition to the great food, Bahay Kubo offers a function room that can fit about 20 people at no additional cost. It can be used for birthdays, parties or just a private area to have a night out with your friends singing karaoke.

Authentic Armenian recipes passed down from mother to daughter. Mayrig is vibrant Armenian cuisine with Mediterranean flavours with recipes since 1932. Mayrig Riyadh is located in Hilton Riyadh at 6623 Eastern Ring Rd, Ghirnatah, Riyadh 13241, Saudi Arabia. Its a franchise of Mayrig Beirut opened in 2003. Mayrig means “little mother” in Armenian. Mayrig is the first Armenian restaurant in Lebanon and even in the world. It is a tribute to all Armenian mothers who guard over our rich culinary heritage. Mayrig offers the warmth and welcoming experience of a grandmother’s house. Our recipes are prepared with love offering a generous variety of traditional Armenian dishes characterized by silk road spices, fresh and seasonal ingredients. Mediterranean, healthy olive oil dishes with contrasts of flavors, temperatures, textures and colors are what make the table of Mayrig so homely and traditional.

Mecca Bah provides a modern interpretation of Moroccan and Middle Eastern cuisine in a spectacular setting that will whisk you away to another world. The innovative menu encourages guests to taste a range flavours. Mezze are served in hand made serving dishes from Tunisia and provide a contemporary take on traditional dishes including kofte with yogurt and mint sauce and kataifi pastries filled with Middle Eastern cheeses. Mecca Bahs award-winning pizzas, such as roast pumpkin, chilli, pomegranate jam and fetta, and tasty tagines, including lamb with preserved lemon, green olive and harissa, are popular menu choices. Warm colours, soft cushions, and Middle Eastern trimmings, such as rows of colourful tagine pots and intricate mosaic wallpaper, create a magnificent illusion of a traditional Moroccan eating house and the refreshing open-air design and deep banquette lounges provide the perfect opportunity for guests to soak up the ambiance.

With great food and a family atmosphere, Bahay Kubo is well known in the Filipino community as one of the best restaurants on the island. If you have never tried Filipino food it is an experience you do not want to miss. Bahay Kubo offers traditional and modern style Filipino dishes with an extensive menu that will please anyone’s palate. Some of the more popular dishes on the menu and the chef’s specialties include Crispy Pata, Lechon Belly, Lechon Kawali and Boneless Bangus. In true Filipino fashion, Bahay Kubo encourages friendship and bonding among friends and family by serving food in the middle of the table to be shared by everyone instead of being served as single portions on individual plates. In addition to the great food, Bahay Kubo offers a function room that can fit about 20 people at no additional cost. It can be used for birthdays, parties or just a private area to have a night out with your friends singing karaoke.

Al Mina is a relaxed beach side dining and entertainment venue, offering both indoors and outdoors seating. Enjoy the view of the magnificent Arabian Sea while you savor a selection of flavorful Mediterranean cuisine, including traditional oven cooked pizza and a selection of artisan pasta complemented by signature cocktails. Evenings see the outdoor terrace transform into a smart-casual venue with a chilled-out vibe offering shisha, enhanced by the tunes of the resident 3-pieces band. Al Mina translating to “the port” is a relaxed beach bar and restaurant serving Mediterranean delights, well-crafted beverages and shisha. The breezy restaurant serves up Lebanese, Italian, Greek and Spanish classics using the finest seasonal ingredients and seafood plucked straight from the ocean. Al Mina has a prime location, situated on the ground floor and attached to the main building of the hotel, at the corner of our private beach and infinite pool. The restaurant is easily accessible to all clients and valet parking can be availed through the main entrance of the hotel. The restaurant offers stunning views of the hotel and the Arabian Sea.

The Sauce “Café de Paris” was developed by Chef Boubier in 1930 who gifted its secret recipe to his daughter and her husband Mr. Arthur Dumont, owners of “Café de Paris” restaurant in 26 Rue Mont Blanc Geneva; thus enabled them in 1942 to launch an astonishing single menu formula, consisting of a Green Salad, 180 grams of Entrecote Steak with “Café de Paris” sauce and French Fries. The ingredients of this amazing butter sauce are still a secret till today. Four generations later, Mr. François Vouillamoz, the current owner of the original Entrecôte Café de Paris Chez Boubier 1930 restaurant in Geneva is the only person in the world who holds the secret of the “Café de Paris” sauce as it was originated in 1930 and he blends it discretely at his kitchen laboratory underneath his restaurant. You can now taste the original “Café de Paris” sauce specially flown by plane from Geneva exclusively to our franchised restaurants in MENA in Riyadh, Dubai, Abu Dhabi, Al Ain, Sharjah and Al Ula.

Guest rooms offer amenities such as a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a minibar, and guests can go online with free wifi offered by the hotel.
Kuwait City Marriott features a concierge and room service, to help make your stay more enjoyable. The property also boasts a pool and a lounge. If you are driving to JW Marriott Hotel Kuwait City, free parking is available.

While in Kuwait City, you may want to check out some of the restaurants that are a short walk away from JW Marriott Hotel Kuwait City, including Lenotre (0.9 mi), Sultanchef - Turkish Steakhouse (0.5 mi), and Mais Alghanim (1.0 mi).

Whether you’re traveling for business, pleasure or both, JW Marriott Hotel Kuwait City is sure to make your visit to Kuwait City one worth remembering.

Kuwait City Marriott features a concierge and room service, to help make your stay more enjoyable. The property also boasts a pool and a lounge. If you are driving to JW Marriott Hotel Kuwait City, free parking is available.
Close to some of Kuwait City's most popular landmarks, such as National Evangelical Church (0.1 mi) and Countdown Challenge (0.5 mi), JW Marriott Hotel Kuwait City is a great destination for tourists.
While in Kuwait City, you may want to check out some of the restaurants that are a short walk away from JW Marriott Hotel Kuwait City, including Lenotre (0.9 mi), Sultanchef - Turkish Steakhouse (0.5 mi), and Mais Alghanim (1.0 mi).
If you’re looking for something to do, The Scientific Center (0.9 mi), Kuwait Towers (0.8 mi), and Al Shaheed Park (0.6 mi) are a nice way to spend some time, and they are all within walking distance of JW Marriott Hotel Kuwait City.
Whether you’re traveling for business, pleasure or both, JW Marriott Hotel Kuwait City is sure to make your visit to Kuwait City one worth remembering.

Clay is serving dishes inspired by Nikkei cuisine. Nikkei refers to the Japanese diaspora, those of Japanese ancestry who choose to live outside of Japan. Nikkei doesn't refer only to Japanese-Peruvians, who call Peru home, but to the cuisine that emerged from the blend of these distinct cultures, developed over years of experimentation, collaboration and expression

OPA Doha is a blend of traditional and modernized Greek cuisine, friendly ambiance and charming interiors inspired by the Greek islands. The team behind the restaurant promises an “authentic Greek experience”, which as well as a traditional menu, will also have Zorba dancing, plate smashing and live Greek entertainment.

With great food and a family atmosphere, Bahay Kubo is well known in the Filipino community as one of the best restaurants on the island. If you have never tried Filipino food it is an experience you do not want to miss. Bahay Kubo offers traditional and modern style Filipino dishes with an extensive menu that will please anyone’s palate. Some of the more popular dishes on the menu and the chef’s specialties include Crispy Pata, Lechon Belly, Lechon Kawali and Boneless Bangus. In true Filipino fashion, Bahay Kubo encourages friendship and bonding among friends and family by serving food in the middle of the table to be shared by everyone instead of being served as single portions on individual plates. In addition to the great food, Bahay Kubo offers a function room that can fit about 20 people at no additional cost. It can be used for birthdays, parties or just a private area to have a night out with your friends singing karaoke.

The Sauce “Café de Paris” was developed by Chef Boubier in 1930 who gifted its secret recipe to his daughter and her husband Mr. Arthur Dumont, owners of “Café de Paris” restaurant in 26 Rue Mont Blanc Geneva; thus enabled them in 1942 to launch an astonishing single menu formula, consisting of a Green Salad, 180 grams of Entrecote Steak with “Café de Paris” sauce and French Fries. The ingredients of this amazing butter sauce are still a secret till today. Four generations later, Mr. François Vouillamoz, the current owner of the original Entrecôte Café de Paris Chez Boubier 1930 restaurant in Geneva is the only person in the world who holds the secret of the “Café de Paris” sauce as it was originated in 1930 and he blends it discretely at his kitchen laboratory underneath his restaurant. You can now taste the original “Café de Paris” sauce specially flown by plane from Geneva exclusively to our franchised restaurants in MENA in Riyadh, Dubai, Abu Dhabi, Al Ain, Sharjah and Al Ula.

location: Abu Dhabi, Emirate of Abu Dhabi
preferences_y: Indulge in the authentic Emirati flavors at Arabian Tea House, a restaurant that celebrates the rich culinary heritage of the UAE. With multiple branches in Dubai and Sharjah, this establishment offers a truly immersive dining experience. Step into the cozy ambiance of the restaurant, where you can relish traditional Emirati dishes like Machboos, Harees, and Luqaimat. The menu is a delightful mix of Arabic and Emirati flavors, prepared using fresh and locally-sourced ingredients. The decor is also an ode to Emirati culture, with Arabic-inspired interiors and cozy seating areas. You can savor your meal indoors or opt for an al fresco dining experience in the serene outdoor seating area. Whether you are a resident or a visitor, Arabian Tea House is a must-visit for a taste of the UAE's unique culinary culture.

An indulgent all-day dining restaurant showcasing flavors from around the world at Al Khiran Kitchen, horizons are meant to be expanded. Take a seat outdoors for a relaxing meal overlooking the pool and ocean or stay inside to watch the chefs in action through the open kitchen.

Kui-Zin, this name is a play on words: Kui for "cooked" and Zin which means "good" in Arabic. "Good", even "Better" is our concept. And, to succeed in this challenge, we opted for "homemade": concocted by our chef Kenza, who lived 12 years in Italy and is passionate about culinary creation. she offers a varied menu: Moroccan, Italian, French dishes and revisited recipes. Natural, fresh products and aromatic herbs are featured at Kui-Zin. We take advantage of all the benefits of the products of our beautiful country to make you discover the magic of flavors, scents, and tastes, all in a lively and dynamic atmosphere provided by nice music and a charming terrace.

Elevate your dining experience at 1484 by Puro. A simple combination of stunning location, sleek design and surprising food combinations. Bring an appetite for the best things in life. Be rewarded with a meal to remember. 1484 by Puro is named according to its height above sea level – 1,484 meters. Positioned overlooking the highest peak in the United Arab Emirates, this unique restaurant boasts a magnificent panorama of Jebel Jais and its otherworldly landscape. Our refreshing menu comprises both the healthy and hearty. Fresh local ingredients are to the fore, with a nod to the delights of the Arabian Gulf only meters away. Savor a nourishing breakfast on the terrace with friends, select something special a la carte and keep room for a sweet finish.

On Muttrah Corniche, opposite the fish market, the charm of the French restaurant « La Brasserie » awaits you from 9AM to 10PM. Come and relax in this quality establishment. The rooms on the ground floor and first floor will welcome you for breakfast, lunch or dinner. The second floor, with its large bay windows overlooking the Corniche, hosts both private and public events. Finally, our staff will also be happy to serve you a coffee on the restaurant's sunny terrace. In addition to its usual card, La Brasserie proposes you every day a menu of the day according to the catch of the day available at the fish market. Kui-Zin, this name is a play on words: Kui for "cooked" and Zin which means "good" in Arabic. "Good", even "Better" is our concept. And, to succeed in this challenge, we opted for "homemade": concocted by our chef Kenza, who lived 12 years in Italy and is passionate about culinary creation. she offers a varied menu: Moroccan, Italian, French dishes and revisited recipes. Natural, fresh products and aromatic herbs are featured at Kui-Zin. We take advantage of all the benefits of the products of our beautiful country to make you discover the magic of flavors, scents, and tastes, all in a lively and dynamic atmosphere provided by nice music and a charming terrace.

With great food and a family atmosphere, Bahay Kubo is well known in the Filipino community as one of the best restaurants on the island. If you have never tried Filipino food it is an experience you do not want to miss. Bahay Kubo offers traditional and modern style Filipino dishes with an extensive menu that will please anyone’s palate. Some of the more popular dishes on the menu and the chef’s specialties include Crispy Pata, Lechon Belly, Lechon Kawali and Boneless Bangus. In true Filipino fashion, Bahay Kubo encourages friendship and bonding among friends and family by serving food in the middle of the table to be shared by everyone instead of being served as single portions on individual plates. In addition to the great food, Bahay Kubo offers a function room that can fit about 20 people at no additional cost. It can be used for birthdays, parties or just a private area to have a night out with your friends singing karaoke.

The Sauce “Café de Paris” was developed by Chef Boubier in 1930 who gifted its secret recipe to his daughter and her husband Mr. Arthur Dumont, owners of “Café de Paris” restaurant in 26 Rue Mont Blanc Geneva; thus enabled them in 1942 to launch an astonishing single menu formula, consisting of a Green Salad, 180 grams of Entrecote Steak with “Café de Paris” sauce and French Fries. The ingredients of this amazing butter sauce are still a secret till today. Four generations later, Mr. François Vouillamoz, the current owner of the original Entrecôte Café de Paris Chez Boubier 1930 restaurant in Geneva is the only person in the world who holds the secret of the “Café de Paris” sauce as it was originated in 1930 and he blends it discretely at his kitchen laboratory underneath his restaurant. You can now taste the original “Café de Paris” sauce specially flown by plane from Geneva exclusively to our franchised restaurants in MENA in Riyadh, Dubai, Abu Dhabi, Al Ain, Sharjah and Al Ula.

Walk-in Shower, Wardrobe / Closet, Waxing Services, Wine / Champagne, Photo Copier / Fax In Business Center Atana Musandam Resort is a novel member of LVX Preferred Hotels & Resorts, Upscale Luxury with Local Flair, known for its sun-drenched swimming pool and boutique vibes are just two of the main draws of the four-star, 105-room Atana Musandam. Located in the sleepy Musandam Peninsula and dubbed the "Norway of Arabia," thanks to its fjord-like inlets and aquamarine waters, this coastal hideaway makes for an exquisite retreat from ordinary life. After an exciting day of exploration, you can return to your warm and welcoming room of subtle Omani styling. *Catch a sunrise from your private balcony or terrace *Watch your kids play in the children’s pool and shaded playground *Ride an Omani Dhow cruising the sea coast in the Strait of Hormuz *Scuba & Snorkelling to unlock the hidden beauty of the underwaters *Ports of Call Tours *Take a Mountain Safari to Jabal Harim *Take a dolphin-watching cruise around the breathtaking fjords *Rejuvenate in the spa with an aromatherapy massage *Feast on fresh Omani lobster at on-site eatery Al Mawra *Head out on a fishing trip and catch your own seafood dinner Whether you want to simply recharge in the sunshine or immerse yourself in the culture and landscape of Oman, one deep breath of fresh Musandam Peninsula air puts you in instant vacation mode. Evenings are just as relaxing with the gentle sounds of an oud player accompanying your dinner.

Internet, Free parking, Restaurant, Breakfast included, Non-smoking rooms, Air conditioning, Family Rooms, Breakfast Buffet, Outdoor pool, Arabic, English, Secured Parking, Free Internet, Airport transportation, Baggage Storage, BBQ Facilities, Bicycle Rental, Hiking, Kid-Friendly Buffet, Outdoor Fireplace, Outdoor Furniture, Pool with View, Shallow End, Sun Terrace Jebel Shams Resort is located in the Wilayat of Al Hamra which is part of the Ancient city of NIZWA. The Resort is built atop of the highest peak in Oman. Jebel Shams is known as "The Mountain of The Sun" and rises to an altitude of 3000 metres. The most amazing sunsets can be experienced from here. A 4 x 4 vehicle is the recommended form of transport to reach our location and takes approximately 40 minutes to ascend from the nearest town of AL-Hamra. The area is home to weavers of heavy woolen rugs in distinctive colours and geometric designs. The views of the Grand Canyon from Jebel Shams Resort are amazing, ideally situated just minutes walk away from the Canyon and some fabulous Trekking and Mountain Biking, just some activities available to our guests. The temperature in Summer is ideal, usually around 30 degrees Celcius, which makes it an ideal place for a weekend break from the heat of the city's of Muscat and elsewhere for weekend breaks or a great place to explore for visitors around the Globe. Please come and visit us at our retreat and enjoy a wonderful welcome from our staff and take in the fascinating view of the Grand Canyon and the entire plateau.

Kui-Zin, this name is a play on words: Kui for "cooked" and Zin which means "good" in Arabic. "Good", even "Better" is our concept. And, to succeed in this challenge, we opted for "homemade": concocted by our chef Kenza, who lived 12 years in Italy and is passionate about culinary creation. she offers a varied menu: Moroccan, Italian, French dishes and revisited recipes. Natural, fresh products and aromatic herbs are featured at Kui-Zin. We take advantage of all the benefits of the products of our beautiful country to make you discover the magic of flavors, scents, and tastes, all in a lively and dynamic atmosphere provided by nice music and a charming terrace.

Walking distance to two major shopping malls, the hotel is also a stone's throw away from the souks and historical sites of the Emirates’ old city, as well as Jebel Jais mountains, which host the world’s longest zipline! Ras Al Khaimah Airport is 25 minutes away, and Dubai Airport is 70 minutes away. Citymax Hotel Ras Al Khaimah is perfectly located for exploring the city and its natural beauty. Our team is happy to suggest ideas for sightseeing in Ras Al Khaimah during your stay. Choose from multiple food & beverage options such as The Huddle Sports Bar & Grill, Claypot restaurant, our all-day dining restaurant CityCafe, 24-hour Lavazza coffee shop and the Aqua Pool Bar. Each of the 204 guest rooms provide contemporary comforts such as free WiFi and much more. Unwind by our glorious rooftop pool and stay fit with our state-of-the-art gym. We’ve also got a complimentary shuttle to the public & private beach and offer all guests towels and beach mats. Whether you’re in town for leisure or work, we've got everything you need for a fun and cost-effective stay.

One of Seattle's oldest diners with a legendary dive bar. Stiff drinks and huge portions of homemade diner classics. Open for breakfast, lunch, dinner and late night. Seattle's best happy hour. Situated midway between Salalah and Muscat on the beautiful coast of Oman, it is less than 10 km from the fast-developing commercial and industrial hub of Duqm. Business travelers can host meetings in four state-of-the-art conference rooms, a prestigious executive boardroom and two magnificent ballrooms with the support of a Crowne Meetings Director. To relax, join colleagues for tennis in the superb Fitness Center, or for a night of karaoke at The Frontier Restaurant and Sports Pub. Wi-Fi and parking are complimentary for hotel guests. Couples and families enjoy blissful holidays in Duqm, playing beach volleyball, swimming in the infinity pool and taking romantic walks along the sand. Secluded yet sociable, the hotel is an ideal base for exploring the ancient caves and wadis of the surrounding wilayat.
